2617.requirement: Search in the Tarnished Treetop area for the strongbox from the "Straight and Narrow."

2618.name: Ba-Boom
2618.requirement: Participate in the assault on the southern octovine during the Battle in Tarir.

2620.name: Cobalt Wurmslayer
2620.requirement: Kill the cobalt head of the great jungle wurm in Bloodtide Coast.

2621.name: Glint's Bastion
2621.requirement: Collect these items and skins to receive the herald's shield, Glint's Bastion.
2621.locked_text: Begin training the revenant's herald elite specialization.

2622.name: Saving the City of Gold
2622.description: Help save the great city of Tarir by fending off invading Mordrem.
2622.requirement: Partake in 100 battles for Tarir, and save the city.

2623.name: Daily Revenant or Mesmer Winner
2623.requirement: Win PvP match as a revenant or mesmer.

2624.name: "Thunderbreaker" Strongbox
2624.requirement: Search in the Noble Ledges area for the strongbox from the "Thunderbreaker."

2625.name: Friend of the Frogs
2625.description: The Nuhoch will warble your legend forever!
2625.requirement: Participate in every stage of building Teku Nuhoch back up.

2626.name: Bo
2626.requirement: Collect these items and skins to receive the daredevil's staff, Bo.
2626.locked_text: Begin training the thief's daredevil elite specialization.

2627.name: City of Hope
2627.requirement: Complete the City of Hope story mission.

2628.name: Magister's Pack
2628.requirement: Collect all items to construct your Magister's Pack.

2629.name: Machined Hammer
2629.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Hammer.

2630.name: Sunrise III: Dawn
2630.description: A shining light of a new day reveals all and banishes the darkness to the deeper haunts of Tyria. Use your crafted Illuminator to gather the light throughout the land in your journey to create the legendary precursor known as Dawn.

2631.name: "Faren's Flyer" Strongbox
2631.requirement: Search in the canopy over the Ordnance Corps area for the strongbox from "Faren's Flyer."

2632.name: Now That's a Fungus
2632.requirement: Locate the Mushroom King near the Itzel village and help the Itzel farmer defeat it so that they can bring the meat home for his soup recipe.

2633.name: Sanctum Scramble: Silver
2633.requirement: Jump, launch, and glide your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2634.name: Tarir Challenge Winner
2634.description: Win one of the challenges during the Invasion of Tarir.
2634.requirement: Place first in / of the Tarir challenges.

2636.name: Grassy Troll
2636.description: Bolt actions speak louder than words!
2636.requirement: Land 100 damaging shots with a Pale Reaver sniper rifle.

2637.name: Frenzy I: The Experimental Harpoon Gun
2637.description: Fishing in Tyria is no pleasant day spent safely on the shore, waiting for a fish to take the bait. It is fought on the fish's home turf, a battle of fisherman against fish. And the fish fight back. Consider this as you take your first steps in crafting the legendary precursor Rage.
2637.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2638.name: Adept Druid
2638.requirement: Begin training the ranger's druid elite specialization.

2639.name: My Friends, the Smiths
2639.description: Story Instance: Prisoners of the Dragon
2639.requirement: While traveling to the Mordrem prison camp, find and rescue the five ordnance masters from the Pact: Baroosh, Shashoo, Beigarth, Izu, and Occam.

2640.name: Daily Revenant or Thief Winner
2640.requirement: Win PvP match as a revenant or thief.

2641.name: Machined Pistol
2641.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Pistol.

2642.name: Kamohoali'i Kotaki I: The Experimental Spear
2642.description: They move through the sea, silent and remorseless. They are respected and feared for their unrelenting savagery. They are sharks. Consider the place of these great beasts in the world, for good and ill, as you take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor known as Carcharias.
2642.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2643.name: Lightbringer's Pack
2643.requirement: Collect all items to construct your Lightbringer's Pack.

2644.name: Revenant: Retribution
2644.requirement: Complete the Retribution revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Pauldrons collection.

2645.name: Master Reaper
2645.requirement: Completely train the necromancer's reaper elite specialization.

2646.name: Envoy Armor I: Experimental Armor
2646.description: The envoys shepherd the souls of the dead to their place in the Underworld. By studying spiritual energy, you may learn their secrets and start your journey toward building a truly legendary set of armor.
2646.locked_text: Defeat a boss in the Forsaken Thicket.

2648.name: Spectral Anomaly
2648.requirement: Avoid the Spectral Darkness, and defeat Gorseval.

2649.name: Denied
2649.requirement: Deny Gorseval from consuming any spirits during your victorious battle.

2650.name: Plasma Weapon Collection
2650.requirement: Unlock all Plasma weapon skins in your wardrobe.

bits.text: You'll miss it the first time.
If you can't stand the heat...

2652.name: Last Cannon
2652.requirement: Leave one cannon operational for the entire fight, and then defeat Sabetha.

2653.name: Undefeated
2653.requirement: Defeat all bosses in Spirit Vale without any party members dying.

2656.name: White Noise
2656.requirement: Kill all of the Vale Divisions within 10 seconds of the first one dying, and then defeat the Vale Guardian.

2657.name: Closure
2657.requirement: Collect all soldier tags from the fallen.

2658.name: Flee the Storm
2658.requirement: Avoid getting hit by Magic Storm, and then defeat the Vale Guardian.

2660.name: I Can Outrun A...Ghost
2660.requirement: Escape the Spirit Woods without getting crippled.

2661.name: Liftoff
2661.requirement: Get launched up to a cannon.

2662.name: Quick March
2662.requirement: Outrun the ghostly mob in the Spirit Woods in under 2 minutes.

2663.name: Piecing It Together
2663.requirement: Read all the journal entries to learn more about the bandits.

2664.name: Backdraft Dodger
2664.requirement: Avoid getting hit by Firestorm, and then defeat Sabetha.

2665.name: Keep the Lights On
2665.requirement: Light the brazier at the far end of the Spirit Woods without dropping the spectral torch.

2666.name: Anger Management
2666.requirement: Defeat Gorseval without being hit by its rampage attack.

2668.name: My Hero!
2668.requirement: Free or speak to all nearby Pact prisoners after defeating Sabetha.

2764.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle time.

2765.name: Festive Imbiber
2765.description: All of these holiday drinks can cause a headache!
2765.requirement: Drink Wintersday drinks. These include spiced cider, buttered spirits, and eggnog.

2767.name: Honorary Krewe Member
2767.description: You must be this smart to enter.
2767.requirement: Defeat Toxx in Tixx's workshop in Divinity's Reach.

2768.name: Winter's Presence
2768.requirement: Collect all items to create Winter's Presence.
2768.locked_text: Purchase a blueprint for Winter's Presence from a Wintersday vendor.

2769.name: Toy Quality Control
2769.description: This can be described as one of those "fight fire with marshmallows" situations.
2769.requirement: Finish round of Toypocalypse during Wintersday.

2770.name: Donation Defender
2770.requirement: Successfully escort Ho-Ho-Tron's dolyak to the gate in Divinity's Reach.

2771.name: Dolyak Defender
2771.description: This dolyak WILL make it to deliver the presents today.
2771.requirement: Survive Toypocalypse with at least one living gift dolyak.

2772.name: Snowball Fight!
2772.requirement: Claim victory in the Snowball Mayhem activity 3 times during Wintersday.

2773.name: Wrapping Everywhere
2773.description: Only one way to find out what's inside.

2776.name: The Wintersday Gauntlet
2776.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle time during Wintersday.

2777.name: Frozen Claw
2777.description: Even dragon lieutenants get cranky around the holidays.
2777.requirement: Defeat the Claw of Jormag times during Wintersday.

2778.name: Disassembly
2778.description: Don't they ever test this stuff?
2778.requirement: Defeat misbehaving Wintersday toys while helping Tixx run the workshop or exploring Tyria.

2779.name: Silver for the Season
2779.requirement: Donate silver to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach.

2780.name: Seasoned Toymaker
2780.description: Getting into the spirit of the season.
2780.requirement: Show your seasonal spirit by completing these achievements.

2781.name: Ringing the Right Notes
2781.requirement: Play the correct notes in Bell Choir Ensemble.

2782.name: Sounds of the Season
2782.description: Getting the right notes is harder than expected.
2782.requirement: Complete songs in the Bell Choir time during Wintersday.

2783.name: Wintersday Wrecking Ball
2783.description: Nothing a little tape and some glue can't fix.
2783.requirement: Destroy every miniature piece of Tixx's toy diorama in Tixx's Infinirarium. (Dungeon instance only; not in the Toypocalypse activity.)

2784.name: Golden Generosity
2784.requirement: Donate gold to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach.

2789.name: Donation Drive
2789.description: Doesn't it feel good to give? Even if not, at least it's for a good cause.
2789.requirement: Get wrapped gifts from the Wintersday vendor and give them to orphans around Divinity's Reach daily for a karma and experience boost.

2790.name: Snowball Mayhem Participant
2790.description: Your hands must be freezing by now.

2792.name: Connoisseur of Confection
2792.description: Be careful about eating too much at once; those sugar crashes can be painful.

2793.name: The Bells of Wintersday
2793.requirement: Complete songs in Bell Choir Ensemble.

2794.name: Finders Keepers
2794.description: Your greed ruined someone else's Wintersday. Jerk.
2794.requirement: Pick up a dropped present while escorting a donation dolyak in Divinity's Reach.

2795.name: Light Up the Sky
2795.requirement: Set off Lunar New Year fireworks.

2796.name: Branded Bane
2796.description: Crystallized corpses as far as the eye can see!
2796.requirement: Kill Branded during the Shatterer battle.

2797.name: Medic!
2797.description: The only time it's wise to run toward the sound of mortars.
2797.requirement: Provide med kits to your allies using the mortars or the glider bomber kit.

2798.name: Shattering Setup
2798.requirement: Use the mortar, turret, and jump pad at Lowland Burns during the Shatterer fight.

2799.name: Crystal Healing Denier
2799.description: Healing crystals? Sounds like a scam...
2799.requirement: Destroy pulsating crystal node during the Shatterer battle.

2800.name: Dragon's Heart
2800.requirement: Gain health while in the Dragon Ball arena.

2801.name: Burns Blunder
2801.requirement: Stand in the wrong place when the Shatterer Lands.

2803.name: No-Fly Zone
2803.description: Get down here; we're not done with you!
2803.requirement: Break the Shatterer's defiance bar time, preventing its Shard Storm attack.

2804.name: Dragon Ball Champion
2804.description: Count yourself among the elite of the Dragon Ball.

2805.name: Dragon's Breath
2805.requirement: Gain Dragon Damage power-up in the Dragon Ball arena.

2806.name: Firecracker Finder
2806.requirement: Find and light all of the firecrackers in the Crown Pavilion.

2807.name: Shattering Evasion
2807.requirement: Defeat the Shatterer without ever being imprisoned in a crystal.

2808.name: Smash the Dragon
2808.requirement: Complete the fight without the Shatterer ever taking off and using Shard Storm.

2809.name: Dragon's Gaze
2809.requirement: Interrupt skill in the Dragon Ball arena.

2810.name: Lightning Reflexes
2810.requirement: Dodge the Shatterer's Focused Lightning Attack time while gliding.

2811.name: Eldvin Monastery Brew of the Month Club
2811.description: Each month, Eldvin Monastery sends out a finely crafted beer to members of the Brew of the Month Club. Each beer's availability is limited to that particular month. After a new months begins, visit a major city to receive your package from Eldvin Monastery.
2811.locked_text: Purchase a membership from Master Brewer Desch at the Eldvin Monastery in Queensdale.

2813.name: Crystal Clear
2813.description: Break them before they break you!
2813.requirement: Break people out of crystal prisons created by the Shatterer.

2814.name: Dragon's Shadow
2814.requirement: Gain invisibility power-up in the Dragon Ball arena.

2815.name: Soaring Weapon Collection
2815.requirement: Unlock all Soaring weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2816.name: Daily PvP Matches Played in Unranked or Ranked Arena
2816.description: Win or lose, you see it through to the end.

2817.name: Daily Top Stats
2817.description: There's more than one way to contribute. You find the one that works.
2817.requirement: Earn a top scoreboard stat on your team in a PvP match.

2818.name: Exalted Legend
2818.requirement: Cross into the legendary division during the current PvP season.

2821.name: Seimur Was Wrong
2821.requirement: Complete the final encounter while your entire party is under the effects of tasty Bloodstone Bisque.

2823.name: Salvation Pass Sadist
2823.description: I think I hate all ten of us.
2823.requirement: Complete each of the encounter-enhancing achievements in Salvation Pass.

2824.name: Salvation Pass Mastery
2824.requirement: Channel the Maguuma Mastery Insight to earn a Mastery point.

2826.name: The Big Sleep
2826.requirement: Defeat the cave monster and release the magic that corrupted it.

2830.name: The Shield
2830.requirement: Liberate the Salvation Pass prison camp with zero civilian casualties.

2831.name: Environmentally Friendly
2831.requirement: Complete the prison camp encounter without using the environment to your advantage.

2832.name: Scattered Memories
2832.requirement: Find scattered journal pages to learn more about the brigands.

bits.text: Near where the ruined path begins.

2833.name: Dominator Weapon Collection
2833.requirement: Unlock all Dominator weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2835.name: Slippery Slubling
2835.requirement: Ensure that someone in your raid squad is holding the golden slubling so that it may witness the death of Slothasor.

2836.name: Avenger of the Pact
2836.requirement: Slay Matthias and liberate the Pact squad leader.

2840.name: Environmental Science 201

3879.requirement: Get through the Forged camps without the sentries setting off any alarms.

3880.name: Daily Desert Lumberer
3880.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
3880.requirement: Gather raw materials by harvesting trees in the following locations: Crystal Oasis, the Desert Highlands, Elon Riverlands, the Desolation, or the Domain of Vabbi.

3881.name: Recitation of the Litany of Deeds
3881.description: <c=@Flavor>It was customary for heralds and traveling performers to gather and compete over who could tell the most impressive tales to assembled guests and foreign dignitaries.</c>
3881.requirement: Bring tales of your adventures to the Elisa, the traveler.

3883.name: Junundu-Wurm Certified
3883.requirement: Successfully complete the cadet training course using a junundu wurm in Kaluun Ravine.

3884.name: Springer Backpacking
3884.requirement: Take your springer out to help those in need, and gain tasty treats for your springer as a reward.

3885.name: Desolation Insight: Silent Isle
3885.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desolation.

3886.name: Master Deadeye
3886.requirement: Completely train the thief's deadeye elite specialization.

3887.name: Praise Joko!
3887.requirement: Stand in front of and salute all of the Palawa Joko statues within the Domain of Vabbi.

3888.name: Daily Desert Miner
3888.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
3888.requirement: Gather raw materials by mining ore in the following locations: Crystal Oasis, the Desert Highlands, Elon Riverlands, the Desolation, or the Domain of Vabbi.

3889.name: Academy Supply Run: Gold
3889.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Academy Supply Run adventure.

3890.name: Iberu, We Hardly Knew You
3890.description: Story Mission: Enemy of My Enemy
3890.requirement: Take out Archon Iberu in under 2 minutes.

3891.name: Junundu Master Certification
3891.requirement: Successfully complete the cadet training course using a junundu wurm in Kaluun Ravine, and hit all bonus targets in a single attempt.

3892.name: Desert Highlands Griffon Expert: Silver
3892.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3893.name: The Cutting Edge
3893.requirement: Collect these items and skins to receive the holosmith's sword, the Cutting Edge.
3893.locked_text: Begin training the engineer's holosmith elite specialization.

3894.name: Master Weaver
3894.requirement: Completely train the elementalist's weaver elite specialization.

3895.name: Tip of the Spear
3895.description: <c=@Flavor>In addition to being a cultured and educated populace, the peoples of Elona are notably adept in ways of combat. </c>
3895.requirement: Recover all Elonian weapons by completing events, looting chests, and identifying items in renown regions of the Crystal Desert.

3896.name: Hidden Carrot Hunt
3896.description: Someone from Highjump Ranch has hidden carrots. Find them to win the game.
3896.requirement: Use your springer to find and collect carrots in the Brightwater Inlet.

3897.name: Roads Less Traveled
3897.description: Sometimes it's good to stop and take a break.
3897.requirement: Find Priory Historian Elisa located somewhere in the Crystal Desert region.

3898.name: Walk the Land
3898.description: <c=@Flavor>Dynastic funeral rites often began with participants traveling the breadth of the kingdom to pay their respects.</c>
3898.requirement: Earn map complete on all Crystal Desert maps.

3899.name: War God's Weapon Collection
3899.requirement: Unlock all War God's weapons in your wardrobe.

3900.name: Path of Fire: Act 1 Mastery
3900.requirement: Complete all Path of Fire: Act 1 achievements.

3902.name: Path of Fire: Act 3 Mastery
3902.requirement: Complete all Path of Fire: Act 3 achievements.

3904.name: Heart of Gold
3904.description: You'll take any job, no matter how big or small.
3904.requirement: Complete all renown hearts for all major areas in the Crystal Desert region.

bits.text: Complete all renown hearts in Crystal Oasis.
Complete all renown hearts in the Desert Highlands.
Complete all renown hearts in the Elon Riverlands.
Complete all renown hearts in the Desolation.
Complete all renown hearts in the Domain of Vabbi.

3905.name: Hero of the Desert
3905.requirement: Complete events in the Crystal Desert region.

3906.name: Master of Trades
3906.requirement: Find and unlock trade caches in the Crystal Desert region.

3908.name: Seeker of Truth and Knowledge
3908.requirement: Find and read all available books and scrolls in Kormir's library.

bits.text: The Sunspear Creed: On a book stand.
Scriptures of Kormir: On a book stand.
Book of Secrets: On a book stand.
Journal: Top floor of the library. Requires discovering Untitled Volume before reading.
The Artist's Mirror: How Art Reflects Society: Found on the ground floor.
We, Too, Can Be Vessels of Knowledge and Truth: Found on the ground floor.
Poems by Danna, Age 9: Found on the top floor.
Magic and War: An Educated Warning: On a lower level, but only reachable by mount.
Journal of Kormir: Found in the hidden room.
Untitled Volume: Found in the hidden room.
Palace of Bones: The Centaur Tragedy: Found in the hidden room.
The Goddess and the Scourge: Found in the hidden room.
Turai's Story: Found in the hidden room.
The First City: Found in the hidden room.
Treacherous Waters: Found in the hidden room.

3909.name: Fast Asleep
3909.requirement: Defeat two of the Forged Exalted before they wake up.

3910.name: Master Bounty Hunter
3910.description: Songs will be written of your heroic exploits someday.
3910.requirement: Complete Legendary bounties in the Crystal Desert region.

bits.text: Complete the achievement "Crystal Oasis Legendary Bounties."
Complete the achievement "Desert Highlands Legendary Bounties."
Complete the achievement "Elon Riverlands Legendary Bounties."
Complete the achievement "The Desolation Legendary Bounties."
Complete the achievement "Domain of Vabbi Legendary Bounties."

3911.name: Expert Bounty Hunter
3911.description: No beast escapes once you're on the hunt.
3911.requirement: Complete champion bounties in the Crystal Desert region.

bits.text: Complete the achievement "Crystal Oasis Champion Bounties."
Complete the achievement "Desert Highlands Champion Bounties."
Complete the achievement "Elon Riverlands Champion Bounties."
Complete the achievement "The Desolation Champion Bounties."
Complete the achievement "Domain of Vabbi Champion Bounties."

3912.name: The Lost Dolyak
3912.description: Search Brightwater Inlet for Jeppa's lost dolyak, and then speak to Jeppa.

bits.text: Help Jeppa reach her destination and talk to her about Bismuth.

3913.name: Path of Fire: Act 2 Mastery
3913.requirement: Complete all Path of Fire: Act 2 achievements.

3914.name: Mini Raptor Hatchling Collection
3914.requirement: Unlock all Raptor Hatchling miniatures in your wardrobe.

3915.name: Mad King's Clock Tower
3915.description: Jump, jump, jump for your life. Fall, fall, fall and you die!

3916.name: Masters of the Labyrinth
3916.requirement: Defeat all 3 champions in the Mad King's Labyrinth.

bits.text: Grand High Viscount of Candy Corn

3917.name: Carving Across Tyria
3917.requirement: Find and carve pumpkins throughout Central Tyria.

3919.name: Courtly Service
3919.requirement: Tithe gold commissioning services for the Mad King's Labyrinth.

3920.name: Lunatic Court's Finery
3920.requirement: Unlock all Lunatic armor skins in your wardrobe.

3921.name: Champion of the Labyrinth
3921.requirement: Defeat bosses in the Mad King's Labyrinth.

3922.name: Mad Memorial
3922.requirement: Track down firsthand accounts of Mad King Thorn's afterlife during Halloween, when the Mad Realm draws near.

3923.name: New Afterlife for Quaggan
3923.requirement: Donate enough pieces of candy corn to give Drooburt a new start.

3924.name: Serpent Slayer
3924.requirement: Successfully defeat Ysshi Hessani and Pek Rakt Grag in the Grand Court of Sebelkeh.

3927.name: Terror of the Labyrinth
3927.requirement: Defeat one of the bosses in Mad King's Labyrinth.

3928.name: Dispersed Energy
3928.requirement: Successfully defeat the Branded Ley-Line Anomaly in Dzasha Uplands.

3929.name: Craving Quaggan
3929.requirement: Donate enough pieces of candy corn to get Drooburt through the day.

3930.name: Tour of the Labyrinth
3930.requirement: Complete the race event in Mad King's Labyrinth.

3931.name: Mad King's Herald-in-Training
3931.requirement: Complete the race event in Mad King's Labyrinth.

3932.name: A Royal Tradition
3932.requirement: Impress Mad King Thorn with your obedience in a round of Mad King Says.

3933.name: Against the King
3933.requirement: Survive Mad King Thorn's tricks in the Ascent to Madness mission.

3935.name: Lunatic's Fashion
3935.requirement: Collect an item of each armor slot from the Lunatic set.

3936.name: Lunatic Racer
3936.requirement: Complete the race event in Mad King's Labyrinth in under two minutes.

3937.name: Routing the Rebel Rabble
3937.requirement: Kill of the Lunatic Court Rebels. Or the non-rebels. Just get in there and we'll sort out the teams later.

3938.name: Mad Memories
3938.requirement: Speak with Magister Tassi in Lion's Arch about researching the Mad King's life and death.

3939.name: Mad Mysteries
3939.requirement: Track down firsthand accounts of Mad King Thorn's childhood during Halloween, when the Mad Realm draws near.

3940.name: Arguably Foodlike
3940.requirement: Eat more than the recommended intake of candy corn.

3942.name: Pumpkin Carving
3942.description: Made in the Mad King's own image.
3942.requirement: Find pumpkins all around Tyria and carve them.

3943.name: Mad Mementos
3943.requirement: Track down firsthand accounts of Mad King Thorn's rule during Halloween, when the Mad Realm draws near.

3944.name: Knock Down the Doors
3944.requirement: Complete door event in Mad King's Labyrinth.

3945.name: Shut the Doors
3945.requirement: Complete door event in the Mad King's Labyrinth.

3946.name: Ascent to Madness
3946.requirement: Survive Mad King Thorn's tricks in the Ascent to Madness mission.

3947.name: The Sun Is Silent for This One
3947.requirement: Unlock Funerary Armor Skins by purchasing them from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings after completing the appropriate collections.

3948.name: Ruins of the Warbeast
3948.requirement: Unlock Warbeast skins in your wardrobe by crafting or using the Trading Post. Recipes can be found from Forged foes or from chests in the Crystal Desert.

3949.name: Shifting Sands Weapon Collection
3949.requirement: Unlock all Shifting Sands weapon skins in your wardrobe.

3950.name: May Her Name Bring a New Dawn
3950.requirement: Unlock Funerary Weapon skins by purchasing them from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings.

3951.name: The Main Thrust
3951.requirement: Unlock Sunspear skins in your wardrobe by crafting or using the Trading Post. Recipes can be purchased from renown vendors in the Crystal Desert after unlocking Elonian weapon skins.

3952.name: Rise of the Crescent
3952.requirement: Unlock Mordant skins in your wardrobe by crafting or using the Trading Post. Recipes can be purchased from renown vendors in the Crystal Desert after unlocking Awakened weapon skins.

3953.name: A Legend in the Flesh
3953.requirement: Unlock Bounty Hunter's skins in your wardrobe by crafting or using the Trading Post. Recipes can be found by completing bounties or purchased from Elisa the Traveling Researcher in the Crystal Desert.

3954.name: Recovered Resplendence
3954.requirement: Unlock Spearmarshal's skins in your wardrobe by crafting or using the Trading Post. Recipes can be purchased from renown vendors in the Crystal Desert after unlocking Elonian armor skins.

3955.name: Under the Stars
3955.requirement: Speak with potential allies hiding within the Astralarium.

3956.name: Istan Griffon Master: Silver
3956.requirement: Complete the Istan Griffon Master Course.

3957.name: Daily Domain of Istan Bounty Hunter
3957.requirement: Complete a bounty within the Domain of Istan.

3958.name: Corsair Keepsakes
3958.description: Because even a corsair has a soft spot for trinkets.
3958.requirement: Find all of the corsair keepsakes around the flotilla.

3959.name: Rest in Peace
3959.requirement: Defeat the Champion Mordant Crescent Graveraiser in Champion's Dawn.

3960.name: Istan Dives
3960.requirement: Find diving goggles in the Domain of Istan.

bits.text: Find and use the goggles on the captain's ship in the Corsair Flotilla.
Find and use the goggles in the Modri Caverns.
Find and use the goggles in Champion's Dawn.
Find and use the goggles above the Ancient Royal Docks.

3961.name: From Downtown!
3961.requirement: Throw a static conduit and destroy a static storm orbiting Scruffy from very far away.

3962.name: Eye of the Brandstorm
3962.description: Journal: Eye of the Brandstorm Completed
3962.requirement: Meet up with your guild in Amnoon.

3963.name: Daily Domain of Istan Renown Heart Completer
3963.requirement: Complete all three renown hearts in the Domain of Istan.

3964.name: Astral Purification
3964.description: You think you can purify Kralkatite through a confluence of astral energy if focused correctly.

3965.name: Timing Is Everything
3965.requirement: Make it to the other side of the Vestibule of Faith and pull the levers unscathed.

3966.name: Daily Domain of Istan Mordant Crescent Champion Slayer
3966.requirement: Kill two Mordant Crescent Champions in the Domain of Istan.

3967.name: Mercy of the Mordant
3967.description: I have to admit I'm a little disturbed by your enthusiasm.
3967.requirement: End the suffering of all 15 downed foes in the Twilight Oasis fractal in one run.

3968.name: Ancient Weapons: Gold
3968.requirement: Collect ancient Sunspear weapons and return them to the rebels before time runs out!

3969.name: And Stay Down!
3969.description: Killing you once was enough, thanks.
3969.requirement: Defeat the two Palawadan Gate Guardians without either Awakening the other.

3971.name: Aerialist
3971.requirement: Jump over Amala's Mystic Wave attack three times without being hit.

3972.name: Thereby Hangs a Tale
3972.description: Story Instance: The Hero of Istan
3972.requirement: Relive the tales of the imprisoned storyteller.

3973.name: Daily Tier 4 Twilight Oasis
3973.requirement: Complete Twilight Oasis at fractal scale 76 or higher.

3974.name: Daily Domain of Istan Adventurer
3974.requirement: Complete an adventure within the Domain of Istan.

3975.name: You Left This
3975.requirement: Find Taimi's hair bow and return it to her.

3976.name: Amnoon Evacuation
3976.description: Story Instance: Eye of the Brandstorm
3976.requirement: Save 40 civilians. Count represents number remaining.

3977.name: Family Ties
3977.description: Finally, some good news to deliver.
3977.requirement: Inform the Awakened Sunspear Champion that his family survived.

3978.name: Lightspeed Reflector
3978.description: The scholars need light to read by, after all.
3978.requirement: Rotate all of the mirrors at the top of the Astralarium within 30 seconds.

3979.name: Death Eater
3979.requirement: Defeat the Voice in the Void on challenge mode.

3981.name: Istan Insight: Pillar of the Faithless
3981.requirement: Discover this Istan Mastery Insight in the Domain of Istan.

3982.name: Tipple Toes
3982.description: Story Instance: The Hero of Istan
3982.requirement: Escape the dungeons without being spotted by the drunken Awakened.

3983.name: Mutiny!
3983.requirement: Defeat the three hostile captains of the corsairs.

3984.name: Qais Closed
3984.description: Story Instance: Eye of the Brandstorm
3984.requirement: Learn all the details of Deputy Qais's destiny, and relay that information to Captain Rahim.

3985.name: Misplaced Loyalty
3985.description: They honestly thought they picked the winning side.
3985.requirement: Kill each of the six loyalist leaders inside the Temple of Joko.

3986.name: Gone Swimming
3986.requirement: Find the diving goggles in Fahranur, and dive into the Eternal Reservoir.

3987.name: Daily Domain of Istan Corpse Caravan Disruptor
3987.requirement: Disrupt three corpse caravans in the Domain of Istan.

3989.name: Sunk Cost
3989.description: Sometimes the gold isn't worth it.
3989.requirement: Destroy each of the three Corsair ships during the Palawadan raid.

3992.name: Unfinished Business
3992.description: Could you please just stay dead this time?
3992.requirement: Kill Archon Iberu during the raid on Palawadan.

3993.name: Exile Executioner
3993.description: Follow where I lead, come whence I call, and the rotted corpses of the dead will be yours to control.
3993.requirement: Defeat the Soulless Horror in Challenge Mode.

3994.name: The Hero of Istan
3994.description: Journal: The Hero of Istan Completed
3994.requirement: Execute your elaborate plan within the Mordant Crescent Great Hall.

3995.name: Lost to Time
3995.description: These must have been buried a loooooong time ago.
3995.requirement: Find all Sunspear caches buried around the island.

3996.name: The First City
3996.requirement: Travel to the First City in pursuit of your friend.

3997.name: Not So Shocking
3997.description: Story Instance: Eye of the Brandstorm
3997.requirement: Repel the Branded from the Free City of Amnoon without being struck by lightning.

3998.name: Deathsaver
3998.description: Be the spirts' savior, or see the Eater savor.
3998.requirement: Complete the Statue of Death event.

3999.name: Bookworm
3999.description: Or at least read the back cover.
3999.requirement: Put away and read books in the main library.

bits.text: Everyday Healing: Gift of the Monk

4000.name: Brandstone Research
4000.description: Istan is being bombarded by Brandstones, which may have unique and useful properties.

4002.name: Electric City
4002.description: Story Instance: Eye of the Brandstorm
4002.requirement: Repel the Branded from the Free City of Amnoon in under 12 minutes.

4003.name: Stop Right There
4003.description: Story Instance: The Hero of Istan
4003.requirement: Defeat the Awakened guard who goes to check on the riot before he can reach the top of the stairwell.

4004.name: Souled Out
4004.description: That vessel acts only on anger and instinct.

4005.name: Daily Domain of Istan Racer
4005.requirement: Complete a race within the Domain of Istan.

4006.name: Daily Tier 2 Twilight Oasis
4006.requirement: Complete Twilight Oasis at fractal scale 26 or higher.

4007.name: Not Thirsty
4007.requirement: Destroy 25 Fountains of Joko while raiding the Mordant Crescent Great Hall.

4008.name: Race to the Finish: Domain of Istan
4008.requirement: Finish the race to Issnur Bay in first, second, or third place.

4009.name: Convincing the Corsair
4009.requirement: Travel to the flotilla and negotiate your terms with the Corsair captain.

4010.name: The Ferrywoman
4010.description: For life inevitably yields the stage to death, as the day to the night, as the river to the sea.
4010.requirement: Complete the River of Souls event.

4012.name: Belligerent Brawl
4012.description: Mehdi's Monstrous Grogs won't kill you, but they won't help.
4012.requirement: Defeat one of the Corsair captains while under the effects of Mehdi's Monstrous Grogs.

4013.name: Portal Dodger
4013.description: I don't know where that portal goes, but it can't be good.
4013.requirement: Defeat Warden Amala without stepping on one of her portals.

4014.name: Who's Laughing Now?
4014.description: Laughing in the face of danger.
4014.requirement: Defeat the Awakened Sunspear Champion without allowing him to heal.

4016.name: What's Death May Never Die
4016.description: There is no conclusion more natural than death.
4016.requirement: Defeat the Voice in the Void.

4017.name: Daily Domain of Istan Hidden Stash Hunter
4017.requirement: Open three Hidden Stashes within the Domain of Istan.

4019.name: Istani Bounty Hunter
4019.requirement: Complete all five bounties in the Domain of Istan.

4020.name: Silencer
4020.requirement: Complete all other achievements in the Hall of Chains raid instance.

bits.text: Defeat the Soulless Horror in Challenge Mode.
Defeat the Soulless Horror without being hit by Vortex Slash or Hurricane Slash.
Complete the River of Souls event.
Complete the Statue of Ice event.
Complete the Statue of Darkness event.
Complete the Statue of Death and Resurrection event.
Complete all three statue events within 5 minutes.
Defeat the Voice in the Void.
Defeat the Voice in the Void on challenge mode.

4021.name: Ancient Weapons: Silver
4021.requirement: Collect ancient Sunspear weapons and return them to the rebels before time runs out!

4022.name: Ally Assessment
4022.description: Your attention is sure to raise their spirits.
4022.requirement: Check in with allies in the Sunspear base.

4023.name: Mehdi's Grog
4023.description: Somehow Mehdi turns these into a strong ale.

4024.name: Hollow Victory
4024.description: You committed the ultimate betrayal. Your weakness cannot be forgiven.
4024.requirement: Complete the Twilight Oasis fractal on the Master tier.

4025.name: Daily Domain of Istan Awakened Slayer
4025.requirement: Kill 25 Awakened in the Domain of Istan.

4026.name: Istan Insight: The Wobbling Skies
4026.requirement: Discover this Istan Mastery Insight in the Domain of Istan.

4027.name: Library Detective
4027.requirement: Collect overdue library books—through whatever means necessary.

4028.name: Daily Tier 1 Twilight Oasis
4028.requirement: Complete Twilight Oasis at fractal scale 1 or higher.

4029.name: Istan Insight: Colossus of Palawadan
4029.requirement: Discover this Istan Mastery Insight in the Domain of Istan.

4030.name: Daily Tier 3 Twilight Oasis
4030.requirement: Complete Twilight Oasis at fractal scale 51 or higher.

4031.name: Istan Griffon Master: Gold
4031.requirement: Complete the Istan Griffon Master Course.

4032.name: That Belongs in a Museum
4032.requirement: Find all the hidden relics around Fahranur, the First City.

4033.name: Necro Dancer
4033.description: There will be only ruined flesh and powdered bone where you now stand.
4033.requirement: Defeat the Soulless Horror without being hit by Vortex Slash or Hurricane Slash.

4034.name: Feasts on Beasts
4034.requirement: Feed hungry villagers in Champion's Dawn.

4035.name: Coalescence I: Unbridled
4035.description: Your predilection for violence has attracted the attention of malevolent energy. Perhaps you can soothe its bloodlust somehow.
4035.locked_text: Defeat a raid boss. (Only available to owners of Path of Fire.)

4036.name: Sore Eyes
4036.requirement: Complete the Statue of Darkness event.

4037.name: Statues of Limitation
4037.requirement: Complete all three statue events within 5 minutes.

4038.name: Icebreaker
4038.description: Dark things still stir in these depths.
4038.requirement: Complete the Statue of Ice event.

4039.name: Stand Your Ground
4039.requirement: Survive the rapid ammunition discharge protocol without being downed or leaving the platform.

4040.name: Champion's Dawn
4040.requirement: Travel to Champion's Dawn in pursuit of Zaeim.

4041.name: Early Release
4041.requirement: Free ten caged dissidents in Champion's Dawn.

4042.name: Raze Joko!
4042.description: It's not a tactical target...but important nonetheless.
4042.requirement: Topple the statue of Palawa Joko inside Palawadan.

4043.name: Some Disassembly Required (Annual)
4043.requirement: Defeat misbehaving Wintersday toys while helping Tixx run the workshop or exploring Tyria. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4044.name: The Giving Spirit
4044.requirement: Donate enough snowflakes to cheer up Drooburt for the holidays.

4045.name: Festival Automaton (Annual)
4045.requirement: Defeat Toxx in Tixx's Infinirarium in Divinity's Reach. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4046.name: Age of Toypocalypse (Annual)
4046.requirement: Survive Toypocalypse with at least one living gift dolyak. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4048.name: Holiday Musical (Annual)
4048.requirement: Play the correct notes in Bell Choir Ensemble. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4049.name: Winter Wonderland Mastery
4049.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle time.

4050.name: Glacial Weapon Collection
4050.requirement: Unlock all Glacial weapon skins in your wardrobe.

4051.name: Season's Generosity (Annual)
4051.requirement: Donate gold to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4052.name: Snow Drifter (Annual)
4052.requirement: Complete the race event in Divinity's Reach during Wintersday in under 3 minutes. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4053.name: Dashing Through the Snow
4053.requirement: Complete the race event in Divinity's Reach during Wintersday.

4054.name: Holiday Food Drive
4054.requirement: Donate Wintersday foods to the Amnoon food drive in Divinity's Reach.

4055.name: Frozen Footrace (Annual)
4055.requirement: Complete the race event in Divinity's Reach during Wintersday in under 5 minutes without using a mount. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4056.name: Ulla's Rival
4056.requirement: Complete the race event in Divinity's Reach during Wintersday.

4057.name: Dauntless Donator
4057.requirement: Get wrapped gifts from the Wintersday vendor and give them to orphans around Divinity's Reach.

4058.name: The Bells of Wintersday
4058.requirement: Complete songs in Bell Choir Ensemble.

4059.name: Leaping Above the Snow (Annual)
4059.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle time during Wintersday. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4060.name: Portal Breaker
4060.requirement: Make an Awakened invasion force retreat from an area.

4061.name: Portal Peacemaker
4061.requirement: Help Ninn construct a device to detect the Awakened portal invasions.

4062.name: Awakening Threat
4062.requirement: Help fight off Awakened attacking near major cities.

4063.name: Dedicated Gardener
4063.description: <c=@flavor>All things have a right to grow.</c>
4063.requirement: Collect all plantable seeds for your home garden. Seeds have a chance to drop while gathering from harvesting nodes that produce that resource. Resource synthesizers in Guild Halls and World vs. World don't create seeds.
4063.locked_text: Unlock your home garden to access this collection.

4064.name: Zone Defense
4064.requirement: Successfully fend off the Awakened in each area they invade.

4065.name: Mini Jackal Pup Collection
4065.requirement: Unlock all jackal pup miniatures in your wardrobe.

4066.name: Golden Firestarter
4066.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Lunar New Year adventure in Divinity's Reach.

4067.name: Light Up the Sky (Annual)
4067.requirement: Set off Lunar New Year fireworks.

4068.name: Dragon's Heart (Annual)
4068.requirement: Gain health while in the Dragon Ball arena. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4069.name: Dragon Ball Champion
4069.description: Count yourself among the elite of the Dragon Ball.

4070.name: Celestial Messenger
4070.requirement: Complete the race event in Divinity's Reach during Lunar New Year.

4071.name: Dragon's Breath (Annual)
4071.requirement: Gain Dragon Damage power-up in the Dragon Ball arena. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4072.name: Lunar Racer
4072.requirement: Complete the race event in Divinity's Reach during Lunar New Year.

4073.name: Alchemist Weapon Collection
4073.requirement: Unlock all Alchemist weapon skins in your wardrobe.

4074.name: Firecracker Finder
4074.requirement: Find and light all of the firecrackers in the Crown Pavilion.

4075.name: Sparking Celebration (Annual)

4304.description: The flame effigy appears during a bonus event upon completing a successful treasure hunt.
4304.requirement: Use water balloons scattered around the top of the Labyrinthine Cliffs to extinguish the flame effigy.

4305.name: Pirate Purger
4305.requirement: Kill pirate in the Crown Pavilion.

4306.name: Gauntlet Favorite
4306.requirement: Defeat Queen's Gauntlet boss in the Crown Pavilion during the Festival of the Four Winds with at least one gambit active.

4307.name: Triple Threat
4307.requirement: Win third tier matches with three active gambits.

4309.name: Pirate Punisher
4309.requirement: Complete the second tier of the Queen's Gauntlet.

4310.name: Boss Blitz: Put Out Pyroxis
4310.requirement: Defeat Pyroxis during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion.

4311.name: Meatless Murderer
4311.requirement: Defeat Strugar and Chomper while denying Chomper any delicious meat.

4312.name: Aspect Gatherer
4312.requirement: Collect sky crystal in the Labyrinthine Cliffs.

4314.name: Watchknight Wrecker
4314.requirement: Destroy disguised watchknight in the Crown Pavilion.

4315.name: Blobs, Schmobs
4315.requirement: Defeat Subject 7 without killing any oozes.

4316.name: Pavilion Pursuer
4316.requirement: Finish the Pavilion Pursuit race in the Crown Pavilion within 2 minutes.

4317.name: Faster than Four Winds
4317.requirement: Finish a festival race in Labyrinthine Cliffs or Crown Pavilion.

4318.name: No One Likes a Wet Charr
4318.requirement: Throw a water balloon at Evon Gnashblade and get him soaked.

4319.name: Blitz Breaker
4319.requirement: Complete a Boss Blitz meta-event in the Crown Pavilion.

4320.name: Darkness Illuminator
4320.requirement: Complete the third tier of the Queen's Gauntlet.

4321.name: Man Overboard!
4321.description: Who jumps off a perfectly good airship?
4321.requirement: Perform a dive off the deck of Kiel's airship, "Phoenix Dawn," into the water below.

4322.name: Master Aspect Gatherer
4322.requirement: Collect master sky crystal in the Labyrinthine Cliffs.

4323.name: Boss Blitz: Wallop Wiggin
4323.requirement: Defeat Wiggin the Wicked during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion.

4324.name: Flame Legion Finisher
4324.requirement: Kill Flame Legionnaire in the Crown Pavilion.

4325.name: Mantle Mauler
4325.requirement: Kill White Mantle cultist in the Crown Pavilion.

4326.name: Master of Markets
4326.requirement: Trade with vendors in the Labyrinthine Cliffs for Zephyrite Supply Boxes, and open the boxes.

4327.name: Destroyer Destroyer
4327.requirement: Kill destroyer in the Crown Pavilion.

4328.name: Ace Racer
4328.requirement: Finish festival race in the Labyrinthine Cliffs or Crown Pavilion.

4329.name: Ogre Obliterator
4329.requirement: Kill ogre in the Crown Pavilion.

4330.name: Boss Blitz: Kill Kuraii
4330.requirement: Defeat Kuraii the Cruel during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion.

4331.name: Four Winds Gale
4331.requirement: Complete the Four Winds Zephyr achievement five times over the course of the Festival of the Four Winds. The Four Winds Zephyr achievement is located in the Festival of the Four Winds Daily tab.

4333.name: Day Trader
4333.requirement: Trade with vendors in the Labyrinthine Cliffs for Zephyrite Supply Boxes, and open the boxes.

4334.name: Boss Blitz
4334.requirement: Complete Boss Blitz meta-event in the Crown Pavilion.

4335.name: Guide to Greater Understanding
4335.description: Combine 2 Lesser Vision Crystals with 3 Vials of Blood, 6 Sapphires, and 15 Globs of Ectoplasm in the Mystic Forge to create an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal.
4335.requirement: Show Xeniph the hope of a brave new world.
4335.locked_text: Create and consume an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal to begin this journey.

4336.name: Legend Builder
4336.description: Combine 2 Lesser Vision Crystals with 3 Vials of Blood, 6 Sapphires, and 15 Globs of Ectoplasm in the Mystic Forge to create an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal.
4336.requirement: Help Bakkin earn renown and fire the Favor of the Colossus.
4336.locked_text: Create and consume an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal to begin this journey.

4337.name: Healing Heir
4337.description: Combine 2 Lesser Vision Crystals with 3 Vials of Blood, 6 Sapphires, and 15 Globs of Ectoplasm in the Mystic Forge to create an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal.
4337.locked_text: Create and consume an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal to begin this journey.

4338.name: Mad Realm Weapon Collection
4338.requirement: Unlock all Mad Realm weapon skin in your wardrobe.

4339.name: Equinox Weapon Collection
4339.requirement: Unlock all Equinox weapon skins in your wardrobe.

4340.name: Mini Springer Kit Collection
4340.requirement: Unlock all mini springer kits in your wardrobe.

4341.name: Full House
4341.description: Sun's Refuge was once bustling and full of life. It will be so again.
4341.requirement: Discover and complete all the collections within Sun's Refuge.
4341.locked_text: Complete Legacy to unlock this achievement.

bits.text: The Convergence of Sorrow I: Elegy

4342.name: A Shattered Nation
4342.requirement: Meet up with Braham at Vehtendi Vineyard.

4343.name: I Brought a Friend
4343.description: Why fight your own battles when you can make someone else do it for you?

4344.name: Requiem: Experiment 1
4344.requirement: Untangle this item from the Mists.

4345.name: A Good Defense
4345.requirement: Unlock Elegy skins by crafting and completing collections.

4346.name: Chaos Theory
4346.requirement: Track down the anomalous readings around Jahai Bluffs.

4347.name: Splat!
4347.requirement: Receive a hit from the Death-Branded Shatterer in an unexpected way.

4348.name: Door to the Past
4348.description: Sun's Refuge has served all kinds of purposes over time.
4348.requirement: Find and place all five runes to open the ancient doors in Sun's Refuge.

4349.name: Matchmaker, Matchmaker
4349.description: Sometimes the best weapon really is friendship.
4349.requirement: Start 15 successful conversations in a row between factions in the Chantry.

4350.name: Jahai Bluffs Griffon Master: Silver
4350.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

4351.name: Swan Dive
4351.description: "Wait, no! Don't give the children ideas!"—Laila
4351.requirement: Find the diving goggles in Sun's Refuge and jump into the water.

4352.name: Jahai Bluffs Griffon Expert: Silver
4352.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

4353.name: Right On Track
4353.requirement: Successfully prevented the Branded from interrupting Blish while setting up the tracker.

4354.name: Requiem: Experiment 4
4354.requirement: Untangle this item from the Mists.

4355.name: Heroes of the Forge
4355.description: But the end is yet to come...
4355.requirement: Defeat Qadim while the challenge mote is active.

4356.name: Requiem: Experiment 5
4356.description: <c=@Flavor>It has a certain...what do you call it, Mist-ique?</c>
4356.requirement: Untangle this item from the Mists.

4357.name: Requiem: Experiment 6
4357.requirement: Untangle this item from the Mists.

4359.name: "A Star to Guide Us" Mastery
4359.requirement: Complete all "A Star to Guide Us" achievements.

4360.name: Jahai Bounty Hunter
4360.description: Face the mighty nine! (Or, seven? Wait...)
4360.requirement: Complete all four bounties in Jahai Bluffs.

4361.name: Manipulate the Manipulator
4361.requirement: Defeat Qadim without letting him get within 2,000 range of a legendary creature.

4362.name: The Convergence of Sorrow II: Requiem
4362.description: <c=@Flavor>Disruption of the Mists threatens past and present, but kindness reverberates through time.</c>
4362.requirement: Undo Kralkatorrik's damage to the flow of time around the Ancestor Tree.

4363.name: If I May Interrupt
4363.description: More like Palaver Joko, am I right?
4363.requirement: Interrupt every single recruitment speech by the Monument to the Return of Palawa Joko.

4364.name: Aquatic Assassins
4364.description: It takes great skill to best largos within their domain!

4365.name: Sniper, No Sniping!
4365.requirement: Get through the sniper battle without getting shot.

4366.name: Gotchu!
4366.requirement: Win games of hide and seek in Sun's Refuge.

4368.name: Jahai Insight: Fang of the Dragon
4368.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Jahai Bluffs.

4369.name: Is It Over Yet?
4369.description:
Koss was impressed. Braham was happy. Time to never mention this again—for Braham's sake.

Story Instance: Legacy
4369.requirement: Light all braziers and clear out the hall within the time limit to make Braham look good.

4370.name: Faster than a Speeding Bullet
4370.requirement: Complete the duel in less than 8:00.

4371.name: Making History
4371.description: Not everyone gets to visit a relic of the past in its glory days.
4371.requirement: Reach the top of the mysterious displaced tower.

4373.name: Fragments I Have Shored
4373.description: Signs of the Sunspears' past may be scattered among the ruins.
4373.requirement: Activate all the hidden symbols in Sun's Refuge within the time limit.

4374.name: Philanthropist
4374.description: "Could be you or me, one of these days. Never know." —Ira
4374.requirement: Donate to refugee relief efforts in Sun's Refuge.

4375.name: Gentle Hearts
4375.description: Kralkatorrik's wrath impacts all living beings.
4375.requirement: Eased the Anxiety of a Terrified Desert Fox in Jahai Bluffs

4376.name: The Convergence of Sorrow I: Elegy
4376.description: <c=@Flavor>It can take a lifetime to learn how to live.</c>
4376.requirement: Console an Awakened armorsmith and change the heart of a Sunspear.
4376.locked_text: Complete Chapter 5 of Episode 4 to unlock this collection.

4377.name: Dive Master: Rilohn Falls
4377.description: When the water isn't deep enough, improvise.
4377.requirement: Find and use the diving goggles at the top of a tall waterfall.

4378.name: In Tatters; Not Shattered
4378.requirement: Rescue every Free Awakened inside the Fortress of Jahai during the Death-Branded Shatterer's attack.

4380.name: Jahai Insight: Crescent's Prosperity
4380.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Jahai Bluffs.

4381.name: Hunted
4381.requirement: Track down and defeat the Branded hydra terrorizing dolyak routes in Jahai Bluffs.

4382.name: Daily Jahai Bluffs Displaced Tower Jumping Puzzle
4382.requirement: Complete the displaced tower jumping puzzle.

4383.name: Dark Tools for Dark Times
4383.description: Missing since the final battle with Palawa Joko, this staff is far too powerful a tool of darkness to leave unaccounted for.

4384.name: Not Today
4384.description:
Nothing is allowed to have that many legs and stay alive.

Story Instance: Legacy
4384.requirement: Defeat the spider broodmother without being downed or defeated.

4385.name: Jahai Bluffs Griffon Master: Gold
4385.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

4386.name: Jahai Insight: Harpy Rock
4386.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Jahai Bluffs.

4387.name: Readathon
4387.description: Joko didn't discourage literacy, but the choice of reading materials was somewhat constrained.
4387.requirement: Find enough books in Jahai Bluffs to make a library for the children of Sun's Refuge.

bits.text: Met Laila and agreed to her request.
A book about the history of another continent.
A book about a spiny creature's friends.
A book about the alphabet, approved by Joko.
A book about growing your own potted cactus.
A book about the history of a great people.
A book about loving...but not too much.
A book about reading the skies.
A book about the goddess of nature.
A book about a magical feline.
A book about the hunger and yearning of dolyaks.
A book that teaches children about springer safety.
A book about honoring your elders.

4388.name: Stacking Swords and Shields
4388.requirement: Accumulate 10 stacks of the Conjured Amalgamate's special powers, and then destroy it.

4389.name: Historical Ambition
4389.description: If only it made a difference...
4389.requirement: Take down one of the leaders in the southern displacement.

4390.name: Run Around for No Reason: Gold
4390.requirement: Participate in a delightful romp at the suggestion of an old acquaintance—and do it really well.

4391.name: Daily Jahai Bluffs Inner Keep Completer
4391.requirement: Complete the Inner Keep run in Jahai Fortress.

4392.name: Legacy
4392.requirement: Regroup with your allies in the abandoned Sunspear sanctuary.

4393.name: Pod Smasher
4393.description:
Branded pods are not edible.

Story Instance: Legacy
4393.requirement: Defeat the Branded Riftstalker without any Branded pods detonating.

4394.name: Jahai Bluffs Griffon Expert: Gold
4394.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

4395.name: Regulars on the Tour
4395.description: Not a pawn, but a participant!
4395.requirement: Complete all other achievements in the Mythwright Gambit raid instance.

bits.text: Hard Hats Required Beyond This Point

4396.name: The Fire Djinn Extinguished
4396.description: His mad scheme is thwarted, the cauldron made safe.

4397.name: Don't Go in the Water
4397.description: You never know what's lurking beneath.
4397.requirement: Defeat the largos assassins without touching the water's surface.

4398.name: Poster Child
4398.requirement: Place all of Zaeim's recruitment posters around Tyria.

bits.text: Spoke to Zaeim and accepted his request.
Confluence of the Elements, Jahai Bluffs

4399.name: Daily Jahai Bluffs Branded Awakened Champions Defeater
4399.requirement: Defeat 3 Branded Awakened leaders in Yatendi, Argon Garrison, or Crescent's Prosperity.

4400.name: Unbranded
4400.description:
You've never been a fan of that brand.

Story Instance: Legacy
4400.requirement: Complete Legacy without being encompassed in Branded crystal.

4401.name: No More Mr. Fungi
4401.description: Just because they don't really exist doesn't mean you can't try to kill 'em.
4401.requirement: Take down a few of your hallucinations.

4402.name: The Best Offense
4402.requirement: Unlock Requiem armor pieces by crafting and completing collections.

4403.name: Exhibit Aye
4403.description: There's enough history in Jahai to fill several museums.
4403.requirement: Find artifacts for Roenn around Jahai Bluffs.

4404.name: Taking Turns
4404.requirement: Defeat Qadim without the same person being sent into the lamp twice.

4405.name: Jahai Insight: Talon of the Dragon
4405.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Jahai Bluffs.

4406.name: In a Grain of Sand
4406.description: Eventually all greatness crumbles to sand. Some great things start from sand, however.
4406.requirement: Gather samples of corrupted sand from around Elona for Ziya's research.

bits.text: Spoke to Ziya and accepted her request.
Somewhere in the Domain of Vabbi
Somewhere in the Domain of Vabbi

4407.name: Watchful Eyes
4407.description: Sunspears and griffons share a strong bond.
4407.requirement: Pay respect to all the griffons watching over Sun's Refuge.

4408.name: Words of Mending
4408.locked_text: Speak with Amira in Sun's Refuge.

4409.name: Mythwright Scholar
4409.description: Knowledge is the most valuable treasure.
4409.requirement: Read every book in the Mythwright Gambit raid instance.

4410.name: Daily Jahai Bluffs Death-Branded Shatterer Battler
4410.requirement: Participate in the Death-Branded Shatterer event.

4411.name: Jahai Insight: Scar Overlook
4411.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Jahai Bluffs.

4412.name: Coalescence II: The Gift
4412.description: Its bloodlust somewhat lessened, your energy friend now desires to learn more about being. Also it wants a name.
4412.locked_text: Defeat a raid boss. (Only available to owners of Path of Fire.)

4413.name: You Can Certainly Try
4413.requirement: Participate in the Death-Branded Shatterer event.

4414.name: Ethereal Exchange
4414.description: I have to stop Kralkatorrik for Nenah and all the others in the Mists who are in danger.

4415.name: Hard Hats Required beyond This Point
4415.description: It has been ZERO days without an accident.
4415.requirement: Stand under every column of falling junk.

4416.name: Some Disassembly Required
4416.description: It's quite simple once you break it down.
4416.requirement: Defeat the Conjured Amalgamate on Challenge Mode.

4417.name: Memorabilia
4417.description: Awakening can be detrimental to the subject's memory.
4417.requirement: Find the pieces of Sonu's past scattered throughout Jahai Bluffs.

bits.text: Spoke to Sonu in Sun's Refuge and accepted his request.
North of the Tree, one still floats; your favorite toy as a child, those red toy boats.
In a house in Venta, an old frame lies; its story appears to whomever cries.
Right is left, but next time it's wrong; in the courtyard you will remember its song.
Along the River of Rilohn sits a large orange tree; with a view of the fortress, true love's flowers be.
In a graveyard from the right, pay your respects to whom they are due; one, three, then seven hold the clue.
You became a military man, though Awakened wear no suit. North of Wurmhaven, find your sword and salute.
Your favorite fruit, let that set in; a farmland's tree holds the key, to those who threaten.

4418.name: Garrison Historian
4418.description: Gathering primary-source documents can get messy.
4418.requirement: Bring Priory Historian Sivvi enough material to learn the whole history of Argon Garrison.

4419.name: Fishy Business
4419.description: "The noblest of all our fish! Fries up a treat."—Lofa
4419.requirement: Find a rare Elonian Red Trout for Lofa.

4420.name: Requiem: Experiment 3
4420.requirement: Untangle this item from the Mists.

4421.name: Bottled No More
4421.description: Even the djinn underestimated Kralkatorrik's power.
4421.requirement: Defeat the legendary Branded djinn in Jahai Bluffs.

4423.name: A Thunderous Fall
4423.description: All the king's horses and all the king's men...

4424.name: Claws to the Wall
4424.requirement: Avoid being struck by the Death-Branded Shatterer's claws.

4425.name: Run Around for No Reason: Silver
4425.requirement: Participate in a delightful romp at the suggestion of an old acquaintance.

4426.name: Good, Better, Nest
4426.description: "I find that old friends will come through in a pinch."—Taimi
4426.requirement: Collect at least 5 gifts for the nest Taimi is building.

bits.text: Speak to Taimi about Aurene's nest.
Retrieve a gift from the Free Awakened recruiter at Vabbi's Necropolis.
Retrieve a gift from Warmaster Steelburn at the Pact Vanguard camp.
Retrieve a gift from Sayida the Sly in Istan.
Retrieve a gift from Zalambur in his office at the Grand Sahil.
Retrieve a gift from Imann in Amnoon's council chambers.
Retrieve a gift from Mal at Atholma Farms.
Retrieve a gift from Azi at Yatendi Village.

4427.name: Finders Inner Keepers
4427.description: Archon Iberu's ill-gotten gains are a matter of legend.
4427.requirement: Be one of the first three to reach Iberu's treasure in the Inner Keep of Jahai Fortress.

4428.name: Raptor Out
4428.requirement: Escape the Mists in the required time.

4429.name: Let's Not Do That Again
4429.requirement: Defeat the largos assassins while the challenge mote is active.

4430.name: Making Cents of Jahai
4430.requirement: Find all 40 ancient Jahai coins scattered throughout Jahai Bluffs.

4431.name: Daily Jahai Bluffs Bounty Hunter
4431.requirement: Complete a bounty within Jahai Bluffs.

4432.name: Requiem: Experiment 2
4432.requirement: Untangle this item from the Mists.

4433.name: Crystal Attunement
4433.description: "Strange sounds. I hear them in my dreams." —Naja
4433.requirement: Collect all the Branded crystal samples that Naja requires.

4434.name: Big Bluffs Hunter
4434.requirement: Track down and defeat the rarely sighted enemies throughout the map.

4435.name: (Annual) Arguably Foodlike
4435.requirement: Eat more than the recommended intake of candy corn. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4436.name: (Annual) Mad Drifter
4436.requirement: Complete a lap of the race event or time trial in Mad King's Raceway in under one minute. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4437.name: Royal Racer
4437.requirement: Finish a race or time trial in the Mad King's Raceway.

4438.name: (Annual) Courtly Service
4438.requirement: Tithe gold commissioning services for the Mad King's Labyrinth.

4439.name: (Annual) Halloween Rituals
4439.requirement: Complete Annual Halloween achievement. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4440.name: Mad Drifter
4440.requirement: Complete a lap of the race event or time trial in Mad King's Raceway in under one minute.

4441.name: Mad King's Herald (Intern)
4441.requirement: Complete the race event or time trial in Mad King's Raceway.

4442.name: (Annual) Ascent to Madness
4442.requirement: Survive Mad King Thorn's tricks in the Ascent to Madness mission. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4443.name: Annual Rituals
4443.requirement: Complete the Halloween Rituals (Annual) achievement. This achievement can only be completed once per year.

4444.name: Close the Floodgates of Death
4444.description: Long-term fixes are a specialty of the Lunatic Court.
4444.requirement: Debrief Brigadier General Kernel on your accomplishments.

4445.name: (Annual) Pumpkin Carving
4445.requirement: Find pumpkins all around Tyria and carve them. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4446.name: (Annual) Ancient Grudge
4446.requirement: Kill of Palawa Joko's minions. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4447.name: (Annual) Mad King's Clock Tower
4447.requirement: Complete the jumping puzzle. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4448.name: (Annual) Masters of the Labyrinth
4448.requirement: Defeat all 3 champions in the Mad King's Labyrinth. Achievement can be completed once every year.

bits.text: Grand High Viscount of Candy Corn

4449.name: (Annual) Lunatic Racer
4449.requirement: Complete the race event in Mad King's Labyrinth in under two minutes. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4450.name: Rivalry of Kings
4450.description: Have a face-to-face conversation with King Palawa Joko in the episode "Long Live the Lich."
4450.requirement: Report to Brigadier General Kernel on the latest developments in the eternal battle between Mad King Thorn and Palawa Joko.

4451.name: Reaper's Return
4451.requirement: Finish a game of Reaper's Rumble.

4452.name: (Annual) A Royal Tradition
4452.requirement: Impress Mad King Thorn with your obedience in a round of Mad King Says. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4453.name: Mad Maleficence
4453.requirement: Track down trophies of the eternal feud between Mad King Thorn and Palawa Joko during Halloween, when the Mad Realm draws near.

4455.name: Djinn's Dominion Defender
4455.description: Yasmi isn't impressed by those who cannot defend their own territory.

4456.requirement: Participate as a member of a team that gains one of Yasmi's powers and wins the match in Djinn's Dominion rated matches time.

4457.name: Djinn's Dominion Assaulter
4457.description: Impress Yasmi by neutralizing enemy territory!
4457.requirement: Neutralize enemy capture point during rated Djinn's Dominion matches.

4458.name: Yasmi's Approval

4459.name: Death in Yasmi's Name
4459.description: Yasmi has reveled in the blood you've spilled.
4459.requirement: Defeat player during Djinn's Dominion rated matches.

4460.name: Favored by the Djinn
4460.description: You've proven yourself a valiant warrior in Djinn's Dominion.
4460.requirement: Gain Yasmi's favor by completing these achievements.

bits.text: Meet with your initial contact to start the collection.
"Sometimes it's okay to have things confiscated..."
"Keep surveillance of her under the table."
"He seems nice, but can we really trust him?"
"I'd hate to have to climb all those steps just to sleep."
"Maybe I can catch some cooking tips?"
"Drinks and secrets are often spilled together."
"I'll cross this one when I have to."
"Recruited a spy we don't need to pay or feed."

bits.text: Speak to Vetia Foerazer in the Blood Keep to learn more.

4998.name: Mad Armory: Carapace of Chaos
4998.description: The storehouses of the Mad Realm contain many artifacts crafted by the Lunatic Court at their king's behest. Although tales of the Shell of Insanity have spread, its descendant works have remained forgotten—until now.
4998.requirement: Show your allegiance to the Lunatic Court by performing various feats while in a ghostly form from eating certain Halloween foods.

4999.name: Mercy of the Mad King
4999.description: Opening a thousand bags and expecting different contents may be madness, but after all, this is a realm of chaos.

5003.name: Mad Armory: Last Rites
5003.description: An offhanded whim of Mad King Thorn, made a reality by his zealous court. Executioner's tool and tombstone in one, this sword was intended for use on the king's rivals. Then as a loyal adherent of the king, are you not are an appropriate wielder?
5003.requirement: Show your allegiance to the Lunatic Court by performing various feats while in a ghostly form from eating certain Halloween foods.

5092.requirement: Avoid the Flame Jet attack in the Voice in the Deep chapter.

5096.description: Where there was once only ice and death, let the light shine forth.

bits.text: A ruin once devoted to the greatest of hunts
A vista atop the highest peaks
A vista in a quiet grotto
A lost tower buried in the mountains
A hidden place, riddled with gates
A vista in a cavern filled with lost history
A peak that bore witness to Koda's loss

5097.requirement: Defeat the Fallen Voice and Fallen Claw without being hit by any damaging fields.

5133.requirement: Discover books around West Bjora Marches.

bits.text: A History of Still Waters Speaking: Part One
A History of Still Waters Speaking: Part Two

5134.name: A Bountiful Pastime
5134.requirement: Defeat the champions wandering the West Bjora Marches.

5135.name: Beckon the Ice
5135.description: The Sons of Svanir offer their power to Drakkar. Someone must silence them.
5135.requirement: Earn gold participation in 20 Idol of Jormag events.

5136.requirement: Dodge, evade, or avoid all of the Whisper of Jormag's Rimebreath and Icicle attacks.

5137.name: High Shaman, High Stakes
5137.requirement: Defeat the Fraenir of Jormag without being downed or defeated.

5138.name: Catalyst of the Spirits
5138.requirement: Attack enemies with the Tier 3 essence skills times.

5139.name: Wolverine's Revelation
5139.requirement: Defeat the Wolverine's Champion Boneskinner while fighting Drakkar in Bjora Marches.

5140.name: Idolatry
5140.requirement: Destroy small Jormag idols during or following The Hunt Begins chapter.

5141.name: Break Drakkar
5141.description: The whispers are silenced. For now.
5141.requirement: Defeat Drakkar within its lair in Bjora Marches

5142.name: Strong, Like Ox
5142.requirement: While performing rites at the Ox Shrine or while fighting Drakkar, prove your bravery to Ox and absorb damage from falling ice orbs.

5143.name: Break It Up
5143.requirement: Break the Defiance of the Fallen Voice and Fallen Claw 5 times.

5144.name: Self-Confidence
5144.requirement: Defeat your doppelganger within one minute in Voice in the Deep.

5146.name: Luminiferous
5146.requirement: Complete all the light puzzles within Bjora Marches.

5147.name: Nimble Onslaught
5147.requirement: Defeat Drakkar without being hit more than 8 times by its abilities.

5148.name: Truly Nimble Onslaught
5148.requirement: Defeat Drakkar without dying or being hit more than 20 times by its abilities.

5150.name: First Foods Crafted
5150.description: Never go adventuring on an empty stomach.

5151.name: Plains of Ashford Novice Explorer
5151.requirement: Complete renown hearts, unlock points of interest and waypoints, and view vistas in the beginning area of Plains of Ashford.

bits.text: Help Tolona Ironrustler with her farm.
Help Crucibis Forgeweld run the armory.
Help Scar Stripeclaw organize the wrecking yard.
Rid the training area of pests.
Help Strum Bassclash secure Lake Feritas.
Help Latera Painstorm fight the Flame Legion.
Help Bryllana Deepmind thin out ghosts.
Help Kyra Sharptracker thin out ghosts.
Point of Interest: Three Legions Court
Point of Interest: The Wrecking Yard

5152.name: League Conqueror—2v2 Season One
5152.requirement: Win ranked matches during 2v2 Season One.

5153.description: A perfectly-frosted treat to get your adventure off on the right foot.
5153.requirement: Eat a Tasty Cake, which can be purchased from low-level karma merchants in Plains of Ashford, Wayfarer Foothills, Queensdale, Caledon Forest, and Metrica Province.

5155.name: Metrica Province Novice Explorer
5155.requirement: Complete renown hearts, unlock points of interest and waypoints, and view vistas in the beginning area of Metrica Province.

bits.text: Assist Professor Gahf in teaching his young progeny.
Assist the Opticalium with lightning research.
Assist Researcher Kaii with Incomp's scrap heap.
Assist PR&T Esoterics with ooze research.
Help Blopp stop the Inquest from using hylek poison to drive lake creatures crazy.
Help Shoon's salvage krewe deal with Inquest interference.
Point of Interest: Splorg Metamystics Lab
Point of Interest: Aquannian Research Group

5159.name: Points of Interest

5160.name: Guildrider Warclaw Skin Reward Track

5167.name: Wayfarer Foothills Novice Explorer

5169.requirement: Defeat players in ranked matches during 2v2 Season One.

bits.text: Help Delilah keep the farmer's fields safe.
Help Gemai support the wardens of Wardenhurst.
Help Elain clear the spider cave.
Assist Valiant Caillech with the Risen.
Help Warden Brulians clear undead creatures from the area.
Help defend Caer Astorea from the Nightmare Court.
Disrupt the Nightmare Court at Briarthorn Den.

5172.name: Use a Tiny Sharpening Stone
5172.description: Giving you the edge you need to claim victory.
5172.requirement: Use a Tiny Sharpening Stone purchased from low-level karma merchants in Plains of Ashford, Wayfarer Foothills, Queensdale, Caledon Forest, and Metrica Province.

5173.name: Vista Viewer
5173.description: Always on the lookout for a good view.
5173.requirement: View 3 vistas in any of the following beginner maps: Queensdale, Wayfarer Foothills, Plains of Ashford, Caledon Forest, or Metrica Province.

5174.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Twenty-One
5174.requirement: Play ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-One.

5175.name: Queensdale Novice Explorer
5175.requirement: Complete renown hearts, unlock points of interest and waypoints, and view vistas in the beginning area of Queensdale.

bits.text: Help Fisher Travis maintain the river.
Help Foreman Flannum improve dam safety.
Assist Farmer Eda with her orchard.
Help Cassie around the moa ranch.
Assist the Seraph at Shaemoor Garrison.
Point of Interest: Mepi's Moa Ranch
Point of Interest: Dalin's Pumping Station

5176.name: Strike While the Crystal Is Hot
5176.requirement:
Collect 100 Misty Cape Scraps.
Misty Cape Scraps are awarded from Strike Missions, Daily Strike achievements, and Weekly Emissary Chests in Eye of the North.
5176.locked_text: Complete a Steel Warband Footsteps achievement, and then confer with Crystallographer Smoxxi.

5179.name: Visions of the Past: Cragstead
5179.description: Unlock a key moment from Living World Season 1 Episode 3, "Flame and Frost: The Razing," which is then accessed from the Scrying Pool in Eye of the North.
5179.requirement: Find a memento of a past battle deep inside the village of Cragstead in Wayfarer Foothills.

5182.name: Moving Up the Ranks
5182.requirement: Complete the Forging Steel vision with a final rank of Imperator.

5183.name: Visions of the Past: Retake Cragstead
5183.description: Having received no support from Rytlock or Eir, Braham enlists your help to retake Braham's village from the Molten Alliance. [Living World Season 1: Cragstead vision. Accessed via the Scrying Pool in Eye of the North.]

5185.name: Cinder Steeltemper's Footsteps
5185.requirement:
Collect items related to Cinder Steeltemper's history to earn her signature Steel Warband sword.
<c=@reminder>Requires access to previous Icebrood Saga episodes to complete.</c>

5186.name: Visions of the Past: The Nightmare Incarnate
5186.description: Unlock a key moment from Living World Season 1: Episode 14, "The Nightmares Within," which is then accessed from the Scrying Pool in Eye of the North.
5186.requirement: Find a memento of a past battle in the ruins of the Nightmare Tower in Kessex Hills.

5188.name: Minis of Steel
5188.requirement: Acquire all 5 of the Steel Warband minis.

5189.name: Heavy Rival
5189.requirement: Compete with Cinder Steeltemper to bring out the best in both of you.

5191.name: Onsite Procurement
5191.requirement: Commandeer and fire stone cannons in the Forging Steel vision.

5192.name: Heating Up the Delves
5192.requirement: Defeat the hidden champions in the Darkrime Delves story mission.

5194.name: Priority Strike: Boneskinner
5194.requirement: Defeat the boneskinner in the Raven Sanctum Strike Mission.

5196.name: Nicabar Steelweaver's Footsteps
5196.requirement:
Collect items related to Nicabar Steelweaver's history to earn his signature Steel Warband staff.
<c=@reminder>Requires access to previous Icebrood Saga episodes to complete.</c>

5197.name: Spa Day
5197.description: Sneak in some R&R when Ryland's not looking. Don't forget the mud mask and cucumber slices.
5197.requirement: Sit in the hot springs after completing the Steel Warband's mission.

5200.name: Emergency Maintenance
5200.requirement: Repair the tank with patch kits or scrap.

5201.name: Dark Wing Weapon Collection
5201.requirement: Unlock all Dark Wing weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5202.name: Mission Challenge: Tank Escort
5202.requirement: Complete the Forging Steel vision with the Tank Escort challenge active.

5204.name: Visions of the Past: Confronting Canach
5204.description: Defeat the fugitive Canach in his island hideaway. [Living World Season 1 vision: Canach's Lair. Accessed via the Scrying Pool in the Eye of the North.]

5205.name: Alpha Strike
5205.requirement: During the final encounter of Forging Steel, attack using the tank's heavy gun while the Ancient Forgeman is restrained.

5206.name: Weapons of Steel
5206.requirement: Acquire all 5 of the Blood Legion weapons used by the Steel Warband.

5207.name: Priority Strike: Voice of the Fallen and Claw of the Fallen
5207.requirement: Defeat the Voice of the Fallen and Claw of the Fallen in the Raven Sanctum Strike Mission.

5208.name: Ryland Steelcatcher's Footsteps
5208.requirement:
Collect items related to Ryland Steelcatcher's history to earn his signature Steel Warband flamesaw.
<c=@reminder>Requires access to previous Icebrood Saga episodes to complete.</c>

5209.name: Delving for Treasure
5209.requirement: While journeying through Darkrime Delves in the Scrying Pool's visions, explore to find lost treasures.

5210.name: Priority Strike: Whisper of Jormag
