5211.name: Clad for the North
5211.requirement: Unlock all 18 Runic armor pieces in your wardrobe.

5212.name: The Spotter
5212.requirement: Reach Vishen Steelshot's perches and help her clear the way.

5213.name: Emblem of Victory
5213.requirement: Win ranked matches during a PvP season.

5214.name: Centurion's Right Hand
5214.requirement: Help Ryland Steelcatcher and the Steel Warband complete their mission.

5215.name: Visions of the Past: North Nolan Hatchery
5215.description: Unlock a key moment from Living World Season 1 Episode 3, "Flame and Frost: The Razing," which is then accessed from the Scrying Pool in Eye of the North.
5215.requirement: Find a memento of a past battle in the North Nolan Hatchery in Diessa Plateau.

5217.name: Mission Challenge: Horde of Foes
5217.requirement: Complete the Forging Steel vision with the Horde of Foes challenge active.

5218.name: Visions of the Past: Canach's Lair
5218.description: Unlock a key moment from Living World Season 1 Episode 6, "Last Stand at Southsun," which is then accessed from the Scrying Pool in Eye of the North.
5218.requirement: Find a memento of a past battle inside Ember Passage of Southsun Cove.

5221.name: Visions of the Past: Tower Hybrid Master
5221.description: Get a flawless victory against your enemy inside the Nightmare Tower. [Living World Season 1: The Nightmare Incarnate vision. Accessed via the Scrying Pool in the Eye of the North.]
5221.requirement: Defeat the toxic hybrid without any party members dying.

5222.name: Artillery Specialist
5222.requirement: Defeat the opposition with your tank.

5223.name: Mission Challenge: Candidate for Khan-Ur
5223.requirement: Complete the Forging Steel vision with four challenges active.

5224.name: Searching for Inspiration
5224.requirement:
Find a collection of Snargle Goldclaw's books across Tyria to remind him of his literary genius and free him from his writer's block.
<c=@reminder>Requires access to previous Living World episodes to complete.</c>

5225.name: Field Medicine
5225.requirement: Collect ingredients for Nicabar Steelweaver's tonics.

5226.name: Visions of the Past: Mysteries of the Eye
5226.description: Complete this to unlock key moments of Living World Season 1.
5226.requirement: Read a mysterious message in the Eye of the North after completing the "Steel and Fire" story content.

5227.name: Engineer's Apprentice
5227.requirement: Retrieve lost supply drops for Ranoah Grindsteel.

5228.name: Mission Challenge: Final Boss
5228.requirement: Complete the Forging Steel vision with the Final Boss challenge active.

5229.name: Vishen Steelshot's Footsteps
5229.requirement:
Collect items related to Vishen Steelshot's history to earn her signature Steel Warband sniper rifle.
<c=@reminder>Requires access to previous Icebrood Saga episodes to complete.</c>

5230.name: Mission Challenge: Powerful Foes
5230.requirement: Complete the Forging Steel vision with the Powerful Foes challenge active.

5231.name: Out of the Cold
5231.requirement: Meet the infamous romance novelist Snargle Goldclaw in the Eye of the North.

5232.name: Visions of the Past: Antitoxin Injector
5232.description: Delve deep inside the Nightmare Tower and set off a chain reaction that will counteract its poisonous influence over Kessex Hills. [Living World Season 1: The Nightmare Incarnate vision. Accessed via the Scrying Pool in the Eye of the North.]
5232.requirement: Inject dose of antitoxin to into the heart of the tower.

5233.name: Priority Strike: Fraenir of Jormag
5233.requirement: Defeat the Fraenir of Jormag in the Raven Sanctum Strike Mission.

5234.name: Fallen from the Summit
5234.requirement: Scour the area to retrieve intel on hostile forces in the Forging Steel and Darkrime Delves visions.

5235.name: Visions of the Past: Lair Light-Foot
5235.description: Defeat Canach's Lair without getting caught in any traps. [Living World Season 1: Canach's Lair vision. Accessed via the Scrying Pool in Eye of the North.]

5236.name: Slaver's Extinction
5236.requirement: Defeat the hostile inhabitants of the ruins in and around Darkrime Delves.

5237.name: Ranoah Grindsteel's Footsteps
5237.requirement:
Collect items related to Ranoah Grindsteel's history to earn her signature Steel Warband pistol.
<c=@reminder>Requires access to previous Icebrood Saga episodes to complete.</c>

5238.name: Visions of the Past: You Made a Friend
5238.description: Rox has orders from Rytlock to secure assets at the devourer hatchery northwest of the town of Nolan in Diessa Plateau, currently under threat by the Molten Alliance. [Living World Season 1: North Nolan Hatchery vision. Accessed via the Scrying Pool at the Eye of the North.]
5238.requirement: Help Rox defend the hatchery...and find a new friend in the process.

5239.name: Priority Strike: Shiverpeaks Pass
5239.requirement: Complete the Shiverpeaks Pass Strike Mission.

5240.name: The Glitched Adventure
5240.requirement: Unlock all Glitched Adventure weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5241.name: Unintended Coursework
5241.description: Maybe it's more of a misplaced feature.
5241.requirement: Destroy all of the glitches in Super Adventure Box.

bits.text: World 1 Zone 1: The bee dogs pass it on the way home.
World 1 Zone 2: High in the branches over the improper water.
World 1 Zone 3: In the cliff walls near a hollow tower.
World 2 Zone 1: Above the drifting logs.
World 2 Zone 2: Outside the furniture shop in the sky.
World 2 Zone 3: Sheltered high in the storm. Bring your flute.

5242.name: Mercy of the Super Adventure
5242.description: One adventurer's glitch is another adventurer's game.
5242.requirement: Open Glitched Chests at the end of Super Adventure Box levels.

5243.name: Good Kitty
5243.description: Fur almost as soft as Rytlock's. And that's a familiar purr...

5244.name: Special Mission: Bolster the Mines
5244.requirement: Spend War Supplies to repair damaged structures or purchase base upgrades at the mines in Drizzlewood Coast.

5245.name: Master Diplomat
5245.description:
Story Instance: Pointed Parley

It's like herding cats, but the cats carry flamesaws.
5245.requirement: Find a balance between Malice and Smodur by not favoring one over the other during the war council.

5246.name: Special Mission: Pillage the Mine
5246.requirement: Destroy structures at the Vloxen Mine in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5247.name: Morale Breaker
5247.requirement: Defeat the Minister of Morale times in the Cold War Strike Mission.

5248.name: Intel Acquired
5248.requirement: Find all pieces of intelligence inside the secret base.

5249.name: Special Mission: Clear the Port
5249.requirement: Defeat Dominion charr in Port Cascadia in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5251.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Minesweeper
5251.requirement: Complete an event to defuse Dominion mines at Lighthouse Point or Vloxen Mines.

5252.name: Tengu Weapon Collector
5252.requirement: Unlock all 16 tengu weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5253.name: Special Mission: Clear the Lighthouse
5253.requirement: Defeat Dominion charr in Lighthouse Point in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5254.name: Crystal Bloom Supporter
5254.requirement: Purchase Crystal Bloom supply boxes at the Eye of the North.

5255.name: Special Mission: Iron Scavenger
5255.requirement: Collect War Supplies from charr salvage found in the Drizzlewood Coast.
5255.locked_text: Unlock by using Iron Legion Special Mission Documents.

5257.requirement: Complete a Destroy the Dominion Comm Tower event at Leadfoot Village or Vloxen Mines.

5258.name: Special Mission: Bolster the Lighthouse
5258.requirement: Spend War Supplies to repair damaged structures or purchase base upgrades at Lighthouse Point in Drizzlewood Coast.

5259.name: League Slayer—3v3 Season One

5260.name: Special Mission: Pillage the Port

5261.name: Special Mission: Bolster the Overlook

5263.name: Special Mission: Take the Keeps
5263.requirement: Defeat a keep lord at all bases in the Drizzlewood Coast.
5263.locked_text: Unlock by using Blood Legion Special Mission Documents.

5264.name: Special Mission: Feel the Pulse
5264.requirement: Strike 5 or more targets with a single Electromagical Pulse from a charr waystation times.
5264.locked_text: Unlock by using Flame Legion Special Mission Documents.

5265.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Speaker Hunter
5265.requirement: Destroy propaganda speakers in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5266.name: Special Mission: Rearguard
5266.requirement: Escort supply convoys to friendly bases.
5266.locked_text: Unlock by using Blood Legion Special Mission Documents.

5267.name: Special Mission: Disrupt Supply Lines
5267.locked_text: Unlock by using Blood Legion Special Mission Documents.

5269.name: Special Mission: Clear the Fort
5269.requirement: Defeate Dominion charr in Fort Defiance in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5270.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Caregiver
5270.requirement: Assist exhausted sentries in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5271.name: Stormcaller Armaments Collector
5271.requirement: Unlock all 16 Stormcaller weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5272.name: 3v3 Contender
5272.requirement: Complete the final league chest during a 3v3 mini-season.

5273.name: Special Mission: Bolster the Fort
5273.requirement: Spend War Supplies to repair damaged structures or purchase base upgrades at Fort Defiance in Drizzlewood Coast.

5274.requirement: Repair listening devices in the Drizzlewood Coast.
5274.locked_text: Unlock by using Ash Legion Special Mission Documents.

5275.name: Fast Purrsuit
5275.description:
Story Instance: Turnabout

Where do you think you're going?
5275.requirement: End the pursuit within the time limit.

5276.requirement: Repair listening devices in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5277.name: Special Mission: Swatting Mosquitos
5277.requirement: Destroy Dominion choppers over the village, lighthouse, fortress, or port locations.
5277.locked_text: Unlock by using Flame Legion Special Mission Documents.

5278.name: Glory to the Blood Legion
5278.requirement:
Collect Charr Commendations for the legions by defeating Dominion forces and accomplishing objectives in the Drizzlewood Coast.
Speak with a quaestor in any allied base to change which legion your commendations go to.

5279.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Drop Hunter
5279.requirement: Open Lost Charr Supply Drops in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5280.name: Special Mission: Lies and Statistics
5280.requirement: Destroy 50 propaganda balloons at the overlook or fortress locations.
5280.locked_text: Unlock by using Ash Legion Special Mission Documents.

5281.name: League Conqueror—3v3 Season One
5281.requirement: Win ranked matches during 3v3 Season One.

5282.name: Special Mission: Communications Breakdown
5282.requirement: Destroy Dominion communications towers near the mines or the village.
5282.locked_text: Unlock by using Ash Legion Special Mission Documents.

5283.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast AA Soldier
5283.requirement: Complete a Destroy Dominion Bombers event in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5284.name: Stormcaller Armsmaster
5284.requirement: Unlock all recipes to craft the Stormcaller Armaments.

5285.name: Purrfect Escape
5285.description:
Story Instance: Turnabout
It's raining cats and dogs out there.
Except the cats are Dominion ordnance, and the dogs are also Dominion ordnance.

5424.name: Ears Wide Open
5424.description: Charr have four ears, but it doesn't hurt to have a few extra.
5424.requirement: Plant all of the listening devices at strategic locations throughout Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

bits.text: Speak with Cato Snapjaw to collect the listening devices.
Strategic Location 1: Behind a tent in the southern Dominion camp.
Strategic Location 2: Tucked under a charr vehicle in the central Dominion camp.
Strategic Location 3: At the foot of a wooden tower behind stacked crates in the northern Dominion camp.
Strategic Location 4: Among some rocks below the northernmost comm tower.
Strategic Location 5: In bushes just below the northeast exit from the cave system.
Strategic Location 6: Near the northern artillery position at Canopy Crag.
Strategic Location 7: Near bushes by the central comm tower.
Strategic Location 8: Next to the northern end of the bridge.
Strategic Location 9: Behind a tree high on a plateau in the southeast, facing the lighthouse.
Strategic Location 10: In some bushes along the main causeway.
Strategic Location 11: On an outcrop of rocks northeast of the southern Dominion camp.

bits.text: 1. In the Mad King's Labyrinth, overhear an exchange between Mad King Thorn and a visitor.
3. Demand answers from Brigadier General Kernel in Lion's Arch.
4. Press Brigadier General Kernel for details on the Lunatic Court's quest.
2. Report to Magister Tassi in Lion's Arch on the latest crisis in the Mad Realm.

bits.text: Someone in Lion's Arch of Canthan descent may know more.
There could be something hidden in the depths of the Durmand Priory.

6455.name: Albax, the Unlucky
6455.description: "Bring to me your world, for I have lost mine." —Albax
6455.requirement: Bring Albax lucky items from throughout Tyria by solving his riddles.

bits.text: "Brave the dead land to claim the foot of the swiftest." Albax pointed north, toward the Cursed Shore of Orr.
"Find the former walker of the blasted land, and gain a symbol of new growth." Albax shrugged while talking of the Branded landscape of the Iron Marches.
"In homes in pale parchment hills, find the form of an old survivor in the hands of a young one." Albax smiled, thinking of the rivers of Timberline Falls.
"In lush lands wracked with waste, ask for that which glitters in their patron's gaze." Albax's eyes opened wide picturing the dangers of Mount Maelstrom.
"The noble bird has been swept from solitude into the hands of chaos." Albax hinted at the monks of Shing Jea.
"The porcelain feline beckons you toward service in the name of the savory." Albax mentioned the smell of food in New Kaineng City.
"Bathed in gold and hubris, luck itself will lead you to me." Albax described a special room of games in Arborstone.
"In the sea of green, among the scaly ones, a relic lies with the mistakes of one's past." Albax gestured at the Jade Sea all around him.
"A sacred weapon is held in the boughs of great trees, never to be turned against them." Albax spoke of the verdant sights of the Maguuma Jungle.
"The needy hold tight to a hope of plenty in a pitiless golden land." Albax cringed while thinking of the heat in the Crystal Desert.

6541.requirement: Gather mementos from each episode of Living Story Season 1 by completing their respective meta-achievements.

6542.name: A Test of Your Reflexes
6542.requirement: Complete the Kaineng Overlook Strike Mission with Challenge Mode active without being hit by Crouching Dragon Wave or Dash.

6543.name: Standing Together
6543.requirement: Complete the Harvest Temple Strike Mission with challenge mode active after absorbing 5 Share the Void attacks.

6545.name: Jumping the Nope Ropes
6545.requirement: Complete the Harvest Temple Strike Mission without being hit by any of the boss's shock-wave attacks.

6546.name: Out of Focus
6546.requirement: Break the sniper out of their Focused Shot during the Kaineng Overlook Strike Mission.

6547.name: Against the Alliance
6547.requirement: Stabilize Diessa Plateau against the Molten Alliance by completing events and returning audio logs to Agent Brandubh. Molten Alliance events award extra progress.

6548.name: Molten Memorial
6548.requirement: Find hidden keepsakes from the fallen in the Molten Furnace and return them to friends and relatives.

6549.name: Clarity
6549.requirement: Complete the Xunlai Jade Junkyard Strike Mission without taking damage from any hallucinations.

6550.name: Total Coverage
6550.requirement: While challenge mode is active, defeat Mai Trin and the Echo without dying or being afflicted with the Exposed condition.

6552.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Thirty-Two
6552.requirement: Win ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Two.

6553.name: The Battle for Cragstead
6553.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Battle for Cragstead.

6554.name: Guiding Sign
6554.description: A much longer journey begins with the smallest step.
6554.requirement: Help guide refugees in Diessa Plateau by rebuilding signposts along the road to the Black Citadel.

6555.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Thirty-Two
6555.requirement: Play ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Two.

6556.name: Ceremony Survivor
6556.description: Story Instance: Ceremony and Acrimony—Memorials on the Pyre
6556.requirement: Complete Memorials on the Pyre without being downed or defeated.

6557.name: Patrolling the Bloodtide Beat
6557.requirement: Complete events in Bloodtide Coast to discourage unapproved piracy in the region.

6558.name: The Facet of Shadow and Death
6558.requirement: Unlock all legendary Zhaitan weapon variants.

6559.name: The Aetherblade Retreat
6559.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Aetherblade Retreat.

6560.name: Investigative Study 2
6560.requirement: During the Sky Pirates storyline, find and read sources of information on the Aetherblade pirates.

bits.text: Help Wanted (The Dead End Bar—Hard Boiled)
Letter from the Mesmer Collective (The Dead End Bar—Hard Boiled)
Scribbled Note from Horrik (The Aetherblade Retreat)
From E (The Dead End Bar—Case Closed)

6561.name: Asset Recovery
6561.requirement: In the story instance The Aetherblade Retreat, plunder all of the Aetherblade chests.

6562.name: Aurene's Facet of Shadows
6562.requirement: Aid Leivas in discovering a new form for your Aurene-based legendary weapon.

6563.name: Check, First Mate
6563.description: Story Instance: No More Secrets—The Scene of the Crime
6563.requirement: Defeat First Mate Horrik within the time limit.

6565.name: Plundering the Sky Pirates
6565.requirement: Loot the final treasure chest in the Aetherblade's Secret Base in Gendarran Fields after completing the "Sky Pirates" episode.

6566.name: Case Closed
6566.requirement: Complete the story chapter Case Closed.

6567.name: Tassi Master
6567.description: Story Instance: Hard Boiled—The Scene of the Crime
6567.requirement: Use the Tassi box to scan 11 potential suspects, primary or otherwise.

6568.name: Fractal Recursion: Aetherblade Retreat
6568.requirement: Complete the Aetherblade fractal after completing the "Sky Pirates" episode.

6569.name: No More Secrets
6569.requirement: Complete the story chapter No More Secrets.

6570.name: Hard Boiled
6570.requirement: Complete the story chapter Hard Boiled.

6571.name: Tigris Cub Collection
6571.requirement: Unlock all tigris cub minis in your wardrobe.

6572.name: Fractal Recursion: Captain Mai Trin
6572.requirement: Complete the Captain Mai Trin Boss fractal after completing the "Sky Pirates" episode.

6573.name: Arms of a New Cycle
6573.requirement: Speak with Leivas after binding an Aurene-based legendary weapon to your legendary armory.

6574.name: Ceremony and Acrimony
6574.requirement: Complete the story chapter Ceremony and Acrimony.

6575.name: Weekly Jade Vault
6575.requirement: Find 4 jade statuettes for Myung-Hee, Keeper of the Jade Vault, and return them to her.

6577.name: Aether Investigation
6577.requirement: Complete the story chapter Aether Investigation.

6578.name: Worldwide Dragon Basher
6578.requirement: Participate in the Hologram Stampede or defeat any champion enemies across Tyria.

6580.name: Dodging Attacks III
6580.requirement:
Dodge incoming attack from enemies.

<c=@reminder>Dodging allows you to evade incoming attacks by spending endurance to roll out of danger, making you temporarily invulnerable. "Evaded!" will appear over your character when you successfully dodge an attack.</c>

6581.name: Crafting Items
6581.requirement:
Craft item.

<c=@reminder>Items can be crafted at crafting stations in cities and guild halls once you've been trained by an appropriate master craftsman. Crafting uses the crafting materials you collect from gathering nodes and defeated enemies as you explore the world.</c>

6582.name: Using Utility Skills
6582.requirement:
Use your utility skills time.

<c=@reminder>Utility skills are unlocked from the training menu in the Hero panel after reaching level 11 by spending Hero points, and they are equipped to the three utility slots on the right side of the skill bar. </c>

6583.name: Defeating World Bosses II
6583.requirement:
Defeat of the world bosses in Bloodtide Coast, Blazeridge Steppes, or Harathi Hinterlands.

<c=@reminder>World bosses are challenging events that appear at specific times of day across Tyria. Defeat them to receive chests containing rare equipment and crafting materials. </c>

6584.name: Adventure Guide: Volume Five
6584.requirement: Complete 11 Adventure Guide: Volume Five achievements.

6585.name: Mining Ore
6585.requirement:
Mine ore with a mining pick from resource nodes in Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Harathi Hinterlands, or Blazeridge Steppes.

<c=@reminder>Resource nodes are clumps of ore, saplings, and plants that can be gathered using gathering tools. Nodes can be found by exploring the world.</c>

6586.name: Unblighted
6586.requirement: Get to Trahearne without triggering any of the Mordrem blighting pods.

6587.name: Completing Renown Hearts V
6587.requirement:
Complete renown heart in Frostgorge Sound.

<c=@reminder>Renown hearts are marked with a golden heart icon on the map. Every renown heart is different, so check your HUD when nearby to find out how you can assist.</c>

6588.name: Completing Events IV
6588.requirement:
Participate in event in Sparkfly Fen, Mount Maelstrom, Iron Marches, Fireheart Rise, or Timberline Falls.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events in progress are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

6589.name: Defeating the Risen in the Ruins of Orr
6589.requirement: Defeat Risen enemy in the Straits of Devastation, Malchor's Leap, or Cursed Shore.

6590.name: Aurene's Facet of Plant
6590.requirement: Aid Leivas in discovering a new form for your Aurene-based legendary weapon.

6591.name: Discovering Points of Interest in the Ruins of Orr
6591.requirement: Discover 5 points of interest in the Ruins of Orr, Frostgorge Sound, or Southsun Cove.

6594.name: Swapping Weapons
6594.requirement:
Use the weapon-swap button to switch your active weapon time.

<c=@reminder>Weapon swap allows you to change between your equipped weapons to access different skills. This mechanic is unlocked at level 10.</c>

6595.name: Completing Renown Hearts IV
6595.requirement:
Complete renown heart in Sparkfly Fen, Mount Maelstrom, Iron Marches, Fireheart Rise, or Timberline Falls.

<c=@reminder>Renown hearts are marked with a golden heart icon on the map. Every renown heart is different, so check your HUD when nearby to find out how you can assist.</c>

6596.name: Using the Mystic Forge
6596.requirement:
Create item in the Mystic Forge.

<c=@reminder>The Mystic Forge transforms items in a variety of ways, including raising the tier of crafting materials and upgrading equipment. The forge can be accessed from major cities throughout Tyria.</c>

6597.name: Leveling Up IV
6597.requirement:
Earn experience to level up this character to level 70.

<c=@reminder>Experience can be earned by defeating enemies, contributing to events and renown hearts, completing story chapters, and crafting items.</c>

6599.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Thirty-Three
6599.requirement: Play ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Three.

6600.name: Leveling Up I
6600.requirement:
Earn experience to level up this character to level 10.

<c=@reminder>Experience can be earned by defeating enemies, contributing to events and renown hearts, completing story chapters, and crafting items.</c>

6601.name: Using Waypoints
6601.requirement:
Travel using a waypoint.

<c=@reminder>Waypoints allow you to travel quickly around the world. They are unlocked by visiting them once. You can teleport to any unlocked waypoint for a small amount of coin.</c>

6602.name: Using the Bank
6602.requirement:
Deposit item in your account bank.

<c=@reminder>The Bank tab of your account vault allows you to store items outside of your inventory and transfer them between characters.</c>

6604.name: Leveling Up III
6604.requirement:
Earn experience to level up this character to level 50.

<c=@reminder>Experience can be earned by defeating enemies, contributing to events and renown hearts, completing story chapters, and crafting items.</c>

6605.name: Completing Maps I
6605.requirement:
Complete map.

<c=@reminder>Map-complete rewards are special bonuses earned by visiting all points of interest, vistas, waypoints, hero challenges, and renown hearts on a map.</c>

6606.name: Using Elite Skills
6606.requirement:
Use elite skill.

<c=@reminder>Elite skills are powerful abilities assigned to the last slot of your skill bar.</c>

6607.name: Defeating the Centaurs in Kryta
6607.requirement: Defeat Centaur enemy in Kessex Hills, Gendarran Fields, or Harathi Hinterlands.

6608.name: Earning Crafting Levels II
6608.requirement:
Earn 50 crafting levels.

<c=@reminder>Craft items to earn crafting experience for that crafting discipline, allowing you to create more powerful items.</c>

6609.name: Defeating the Risen
6609.requirement: Defeat Risen enemy in Mount Maelstrom and Sparkfly Fen.

6610.name: Defeating Veterans in Mount Maelstrom
6610.requirement: Defeat veteran enemies in Mount Maelstrom.

6611.name: Completing Events II
6611.requirement:
Participate in event.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events in progress are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

6612.name: Adventure Guide: Volume Two
6612.requirement: Complete the 13 Adventure Guide: Volume Two achievements.
6612.locked_text: This achievement is locked until Adventure Guide: Volume One is complete.

6613.name: Dodging Attacks II
6613.requirement:
Dodge incoming attack from enemies.

<c=@reminder>Dodging allows you to evade incoming attacks by spending endurance to roll out of danger, making you temporarily invulnerable. "Evaded!" will appear over your character when you successfully dodge an attack.</c>

6614.name: Using Healing Skills
6614.requirement:
Use a healing skill time.

<c=@reminder>Healing skills are located on the sixth skill slot of every character's skill bar.</c>

6615.name: The Adventure Begins
6615.requirement: Enter Queensdale, the Plains of Ashford, Caledon Forest, Metrica Province, or Wayfarer Foothills for the first time.

6616.name: Defeating the Corrupted
6616.requirement: Defeat Corrupted enemy in Frostgorge Sound.

6617.name: Completing Jumping Puzzles
6617.requirement:
Complete jumping puzzle.

<c=@reminder>Jumping puzzles are discoverable environmental challenges that test your exploration and aerial abilities. Search these puzzles out to learn what secrets they hold!</c>

6618.name: Completing Events III
6618.requirement:
Participate in event in the Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, or the Harathi Hinterlands.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events in progress are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

6619.name: League Conqueror—2v2 Season Seven
6619.requirement: Win ranked matches during 2v2 Season Seven.

6620.name: Viewing Vistas
6620.requirement:
View / vista.

<c=@reminder>Vistas are scenic locations that show the world from a new perspective, and they are marked with a red triangle icon on the map.</c>

6621.name: Defeating World Bosses I
6621.requirement:
Defeat of the world bosses in Queensdale, Wayfarer Foothills, Metrica Province, or Caledon Forest.

<c=@reminder>World bosses are challenging events that appear at specific times of day across Tyria. Defeat them to receive chests containing rare equipment and crafting materials. </c>

6623.name: Earning Crafting Levels III
6623.requirement:
Earn 100 Crafting Levels.

<c=@reminder>Craft items to earn crafting experience for that crafting discipline, allowing you to create more powerful items.</c>

6624.name: Foraging Plants
6624.requirement:
Harvest material from resource nodes in the Ruins of Orr, Frostgorge Sound, or Southsun Cove.

<c=@reminder>Resource nodes are clumps of ore, saplings, and plants that can be gathered using gathering tools. Nodes can be found by exploring the world.</c>

6625.name: Basic Training: Salvaging Items
6625.requirement:
Use a salvage kit to salvage item.

<c=@reminder>Some items you'll find will be salvageable. Use a salvage kit to break them down into crafting materials.</c>

6626.name: Adventure Guide: Volume Four
6626.requirement: Complete 15 of the 17 Adventure Guide: Volume Four achievements.
6626.locked_text: This achievement is locked until Adventure Guide: Volume Three is complete.

6627.name: Dodging Attacks V
6627.requirement:
Dodge incoming attack from enemies.

<c=@reminder>Dodging allows you to evade incoming attacks by spending endurance to roll out of danger, making you temporarily invulnerable. "Evaded!" will appear over your character when you successfully dodge an attack.</c>

6628.name: Completing Story Chapters I
6628.requirement:
Complete chapter 1 of your story.

<c=@reminder>You can select your active story and view your progress from the Story Journal menu in the Hero panel.</c>

6629.name: Completing Maps II
6629.requirement:
Complete 3 maps.

<c=@reminder>Map-complete rewards are special bonuses earned by visiting all points of interest, vistas, waypoints, hero challenges, and renown hearts on a map.</c>

6631.name: Leveling Up II
6631.requirement:
Earn experience to level up this character to level 30.

<c=@reminder>Experience can be earned by defeating enemies, contributing to events and renown hearts, completing story chapters, and crafting items.</c>

6632.name: Fox Fire Weapon Collection
6632.requirement: Unlock all Fox Fire weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6633.name: The Facet of Plant and Mind
6633.requirement: Unlock all legendary Mordremoth weapon variants.

6634.name: Discovering Points of Interest II
6634.requirement:
Discover 5 points of interest in Snowden Drifts, Diessa Plateau, Brisban Wildlands, or Kessex Hills.

<c=@reminder>Points of interest are special locations marked by name in the world, indicated by a square icon on the map. </c>

6635.name: Using Profession Mechanic Skills
6635.requirement:
Activate your profession mechanic skills times.

<c=@reminder>Profession mechanic skills appear above your weapon skills, and they have unique effects depending on your character's profession.</c>

6636.name: Reviving Allies
6636.requirement:
Revive ally.

<c=@reminder>Downed or defeated players and allies can be revived by approaching and interacting with them to restore their health. Multiple people can revive the same ally at once to restore health faster.</c>

6637.name: Adventure Guide: Volume One
6637.requirement: Complete 14 of the 16 Adventure Guide: Volume One achievements.

6638.name: Applying Conditions
6638.requirement:
Apply conditions to enemies.

<c=@reminder>Conditions are negative effects that apply damage and control effects in combat. Check the tooltip for your skills to determine if your attacks can apply conditions to enemies.</c>

6639.name: Completing Story Chapters II
6639.requirement:
Complete chapter 3 of your story.

<c=@reminder>You can select your active story and view your progress from the Story Journal menu in the Hero panel.</c>

6640.name: Using Combo Skills
6640.requirement:
Use combo skill.

<c=@reminder>Combo skills are performed by using a skill marked as a combo finisher while inside a combo field generated by another ability. Check the tooltips for your weapon and utility skills to find potential combinations!</c>

6641.name: Using Food Consumables
6641.requirement:
Use consumable food item to obtain nourishment bonuses.

<c=@reminder>Food consumables boost attributes when eaten. Hover your mouse over a consumable to see what it does.</c>

6642.name: Transmuting Skins
6642.requirement:
Transmute item.

<c=@reminder>Transmutation expends transmutation charges to replace the skin of a piece of equipment with a different one from your account wardrobe. Transmutation charges can be found in daily reward chests, earned by completing maps, or purchased from the Gem Store.</c>

6643.name: Defeating the Grawl, Hylek, Dredge, and Krait
6643.requirement: Defeat grawl, hylek, dredge, or krait enemy.

6644.name: Completing Group Events
6644.requirement:
Complete group event.

<c=@reminder>Group events are a special kind of event that will likely require several players to complete. These are indicated by the "Group Event" tag in the event's name.</c>

6645.name: Earning Crafting Levels IV
6645.requirement:
Earn 150 crafting levels.

<c=@reminder>Craft items to earn crafting experience for that crafting discipline, allowing you to create more powerful items.</c>

6646.name: Dodging Attacks I
6646.requirement:
Dodge incoming attack from enemies.

<c=@reminder>Dodging allows you to evade incoming attacks by spending endurance to roll out of danger, making you temporarily invulnerable. "Evaded!" will appear over your character when you successfully dodge an attack.</c>

6647.name: Scouting the Area
6647.requirement:
Speak with scouts in Queensdale, Metrica Province, Caledon Forest, Wayfarer Foothills, or the Plains of Ashford to discover more about the local area.

<c=@reminder>Scouts appear with a spyglass icon on your map. They can point you toward nearby goals and landmarks when you speak to them.</c>

6648.name: Completing Story Chapters III
6648.requirement:
Complete chapter 5 of your story.

<c=@reminder>You can select your active story and view your progress from the Story Journal menu in the Hero panel.</c>

6649.name: Completing Story Chapters IV
6649.requirement:
Complete chapter 7 of your story.

<c=@reminder>You can select your active story and view your progress from the Story Journal menu in the Hero panel.</c>

6650.name: Defeating the Inquest
6650.requirement: Defeat Inquest enemy in Mount Maelstrom and Sparkfly Fen.

6651.name: Defeating the Destroyers
6651.requirement: Defeat Destroyer enemy in Mount Maelstrom.

6654.name: Defeating Champions in the Ruins of Orr
6654.requirement: Defeat champions in the Straits of Devastation, Malchor's Leap, or the Cursed Shore.

6655.name: League Slayer—2v2 Season Seven
6655.requirement: Defeat players in ranked matches during 2v2 Season Seven.

6656.name: Completing Events V
6656.requirement:
Participate in event in the Ruins of Orr, Frostgorge Sound, or Southsun Cove.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events in progress are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

6657.name: Applying Dye
6657.requirement:
Dye piece of equipment.

<c=@reminder>Dye are colors that can be applied to equipped armor, outfits, mounts, and gliders, allowing you to personalize the look of your character. You can access your dyes from the Dye tab in your Hero panel.</c>

6659.name: Completing Renown Hearts I
6659.requirement:
Complete renown heart.

<c=@reminder>Renown hearts are marked with a golden heart icon on the map. Every renown heart is different, so check your HUD when nearby to find out how you can assist.</c>

6660.name: Earning Crafting Levels I
6660.requirement:
Earn 10 crafting levels.

<c=@reminder>Craft items to earn crafting experience for that crafting discipline, allowing you to create more powerful items.</c>

6661.name: Defeating World Bosses III
6661.requirement:
Defeat of the world bosses in Frostgorge Sound or Mount Maelstrom.

<c=@reminder>World bosses are challenging events that appear at specific times of day across Tyria. Defeat them to receive chests containing rare equipment and crafting materials. </c>

6662.name: Looting Enemies
6662.requirement:
Loot defeated enemies.

<c=@reminder>Sometimes enemies will drop items when defeated, indicated by a golden sparkle around their body. Interact with these enemies to loot these items and add them to your inventory.</c>

6663.name: Completing Events I
6663.requirement:
Participate in event.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

6664.name: Basic Training: Rallying
6664.requirement:
Rally from a downed state time.

<c=@reminder>Rallying allows you to recover from a downed state by defeating a foe that grants experience.</c>

6665.name: Defeating the Branded in Ascalon
6665.requirement: Defeat Branded enemy in the Blazeridge Steppes, Fields of Ruin, or Iron Marches.

6667.name: Adventure Guide: Volume Three
6667.requirement: Complete the 10 Adventure Guide: Volume Three achievements.
6667.locked_text: This achievement is locked until Adventure Guide: Volume Two is complete.

6668.name: Dodging Attacks IV
6668.requirement:
Dodge incoming attack from enemies.

<c=@reminder>Dodging allows you to evade incoming attacks by spending endurance to roll out of danger, making you temporarily invulnerable. "Evaded!" will appear over your character when you successfully dodge an attack.</c>

6669.name: Discovering Points of Interest I
6669.requirement:
Discover point of interest in Queensdale, Metrica Province, Caledon Forest, Wayfarer Foothills, or the Plains of Ashford.

<c=@reminder>Points of interest are special locations marked by name in the world, indicated by a square icon on the map. </c>

6670.name: Completing Renown Hearts II
6670.requirement:
Complete renown heart in Snowden Drifts, Diessa Plateau, Brisban Wildlands, or Kessex Hills.

<c=@reminder>Renown hearts are marked with a golden heart icon on the map. Every renown heart is different, so check your HUD when nearby to find out how you can assist.</c>

6671.name: Defeating the Flame Legion
6671.requirement: Defeat Flame Legion enemy in Iron Marches and Fireheart Rise.

6672.name: Depositing Materials
6672.requirement:
Deposit items in your material storage.

<c=@reminder>Material storage is a tab within your account vault that allows you to store crafting materials for easy access when crafting. Items can be deposited directly to the material storage from your inventory at any time.</c>

6673.name: Basic Training: Earning Hero Points
6673.requirement:
Earn hero point.

<c=#B0B0B0>Earn hero points by completing hidden hero challenges you discover while exploring the world. After level 11, these can be spent to unlock new skills and traits.</c>

6674.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Thirty-Three
6674.requirement: Win ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Three.

6675.name: Completing Renown Hearts III
6675.requirement:
Complete renown heart in the Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, or the Harathi Hinterlands.

<c=@reminder>Renown hearts are marked with a golden heart icon on the map. Every renown heart is different, so check your HUD when nearby to find out how you can assist.</c>

6676.name: Utility Consumables
6676.requirement:
Consume utility item to obtain utility enhancements.

<c=@reminder>Utility consumables are items that increase specific combat abilities. Double-click utility consumables to use them.</c>

6677.name: Entering World vs. World
6677.requirement:
Enter World vs. World map.

<c=@reminder>Storm castles and conquer territories in World vs. World! Enter the Mists from Eternal Battlegrounds asura gates in Lion's Arch, which can be traveled to from major cities, or by clicking the castle icon in the top-left corner of your screen.</c>

6678.name: Using Emotes
6678.requirement:
Use emote to express yourself!

<c=@reminder>Emotes allow your character to show their feelings to the world. Type "/emotelist" in your chat for a list of possible emotes.</c>

6680.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Thirty-Three
6680.requirement: Defeat players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Three.

6681.name: Defeating the Karka in Southsun Cove

6683.name: Daily Portal Closer
6683.requirement: Stop one of Scarlet's portal invasion events in Gendarran Fields.

6684.name: Clockwork Invasion
6684.requirement: Complete the story chapter Clockwork Invasion.

6685.name: Investigative Record 1
6685.requirement: Find and listen to hidden logs from the source of the chaos.

6686.name: Scarlet's Playhouse
6686.requirement: Complete the story chapter Scarlet's Playhouse.

6687.name: Spoils of Chaos
6687.requirement: Find hidden chests to aggravate the playhouse's master.

6688.name: Picking Up the Pieces
6688.requirement: Complete the story chapter Picking Up the Pieces.

6689.name: The Opening Ceremony
6689.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Opening Ceremony.

6691.name: Deft Defusing
6691.requirement: Disarm four bombs within the challenge time limit.

6693.name: The Higher Road
6693.requirement: Avoid engaging in combat while navigating the centaur maze.

6694.name: The Queen's Address
6694.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Queen's Address.

6695.name: Kryta's Finest
6695.requirement: Cheer for Logan after he claims victory in the arena.

6696.name: Guarding the Fields
6696.requirement: Complete events in Gendarran Fields to safeguard settlements in the area.

6698.name: The Facet of Crystal and Fury
6698.requirement: Unlock all legendary Kralkatorrik weapon variants.

6705.name: (Weekly) Four Winds Festivities
6705.description: Weekly achievement. Progress resets on Monday morning.
6705.requirement: Participate in the Boss Blitz, Queen's Gauntlet, Treasure Hunt, and Four Winds mount races. Progress awarded varies based on the activity.

6708.name: Traveler of Four Winds
6708.requirement: Participate in the Labyrinthine Cliffs Treasure Hunt or defeat any champion enemies across Tyria.

6712.name: Discovering Points of Interest IV
6712.requirement:
Discover 5 points of interest in Sparkfly Fen, Mount Maelstrom, the Iron Marches, the Fireheart Rise, or Timberline Falls.

<c=@reminder>Points of interest are special locations marked by name in the world, indicated by a square icon on the map. </c>

6714.name: Decade of Champions: The Shatterer
6714.requirement: Defeat the Shatterer in Lowland Burns in the Blazeridge Steppes.

6715.name: Viewing Vistas III
6715.requirement:
View / vista in the Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, or the Harathi Hinterlands.

<c=@reminder>Vistas are scenic locations that show the world from a new perspective, and they are marked with a red triangle icon on the map.</c>

6716.name: Decade of Adventure: Crystal Desert
6716.requirement: Complete events in the Crystal Desert region.

6718.name: WvW World Restructuring Beta Veteran
6718.requirement: Successfully capture or defend 5 WvW objectives during the beta period.

6720.name: Decade of Adventure: Ascalon
6720.requirement: Complete events in the Ascalon region.

6721.name: Discovering Waypoints III
6721.requirement:
Discover 5 waypoints in Sparkfly Fen, Mount Maelstrom, Iron Marches, Fireheart Rise, or Timberline Falls.

<c=@reminder>Waypoints allow you to travel quickly around the world. They are unlocked by visiting them once. You can teleport to any unlocked waypoint for a small amount of coin.</c>

6723.name: Decade of Adventure: Kryta
6723.requirement: Complete events in the Kryta region.

6724.name: Decade of Adventure: Heart of Maguuma
6724.requirement: Complete events in the Heart of Maguuma region.

6725.name: Viewing Vistas IV
6725.requirement:
View / vista in Sparkfly Fen, Mount Maelstrom, Iron Marches, Fireheart Rise, or Timberline Falls.

<c=@reminder>Vistas are scenic locations that show the world from a new perspective, and they are marked with a red triangle icon on the map.</c>

6727.name: Discovering Waypoints
6727.requirement:
Discover 5 waypoints in Snowden Drifts, Diessa Plateau, Brisban Wildlands, or Kessex Hills.

<c=@reminder>Waypoints allow you to travel quickly around the world. They are unlocked by visiting them once. You can teleport to any unlocked waypoint for a small amount of coin.</c>

6728.name: Decade of Adventure: Maguuma Jungle
6728.requirement: Complete events in the Maguuma Jungle region.

6729.name: Decade of Adventure: Orr
6729.requirement: Complete events in the Orr region.

6730.name: Decade of Adventure: Shiverpeaks
6730.requirement: Complete events in the Shiverpeaks region.

6731.name: Viewing Vistas II
6731.requirement:
View / vista in Snowden Drifts, Diessa Plateau, Brisban Wildlands, or Kessex Hills.

<c=@reminder>Vistas are scenic locations that show the world from a new perspective, and they are marked with a red triangle icon on the map.</c>

6732.name: Decade of Champions: Fire Elemental
6732.requirement: Defeat the fire elemental in the Thaumanova Reactor in Metrica Province.

6733.name: Training Skills
6733.requirement:
Spend hero points to train a skill.

<c=@reminder>Skills can be learned in the Training tab of the Hero panel by spending hero points. </c>

6734.name: Viewing Vistas V
6734.requirement:
View / vista in Ruins of Orr, Frostgorge Sound, or Southsun Cove.

<c=@reminder>Vistas are scenic locations that show the world from a new perspective, and they are marked with a red triangle icon on the map.</c>

6735.name: Decade of the Dragons
6735.requirement: Complete achievements from the Decade of the Dragons category.

6736.name: Decade of Champions: Frozen Maw
6736.requirement: Defeat the Champion Svanir Shaman Chief and break his control over the ice elemental in Frusenfell Creek in Wayfarer's Foothills.

6737.name: Decade of Champions: Shadow Behemoth
6737.requirement: Defeat the Shadow Behemoth in Godslost Swamp in Queensdale.

6738.name: Decade of Battle: World vs. World
6738.requirement: Complete events in World vs. World.

6739.name: Decade of Champions: Claw of Jormag
6739.requirement: Defeat the Claw of Jormag on the Frostwalk Tundra in Frostgorge Sound.

6740.name: Decade of Champions: Great Jungle Wurm
6740.requirement: Defeat the great jungle wurm in Wychmire Swamp in Caledon Forest.

6741.name: Selecting Crafting Disciplines
6741.requirement:
Train in a crafting discipline from a crafting master.

<c=@reminder>Items can be crafted at crafting stations in cities and guild halls once you've been trained by an appropriate master craftsman. Crafting uses the crafting materials you collect from gathering nodes and defeated enemies as you explore the world.</c>

6744.name: Discovering Points of Interest III
6744.requirement:
Discover 5 points of interest in the Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, or the Harathi Hinterlands.

<c=@reminder>Points of interest are special locations marked by name in the world, indicated by a square icon on the map. </c>

6745.name: Decade of Adventure: Cantha
6745.requirement: Complete events in the Cantha region.

6746.name: Discovering Waypoints II
6746.requirement:
Discover 5 waypoints in in the Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, or the Harathi Hinterlands.

<c=@reminder>Waypoints allow you to travel quickly around the world. They are unlocked by visiting them once. You can teleport to any unlocked waypoint for a small amount of coin.</c>

6747.name: Kraitmare Averted, Again
6747.requirement: Defeat Ensolyss within the time limit.

6748.name: Fight at the Finish
6748.requirement: Defeat the Knight of Rot before escaping the tower.

6749.name: The Nightmare Incarnate
6749.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Nightmare Incarnate.

6750.name: The Tower of Nightmares
6750.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Tower of Nightmares.

6751.name: Making the Antitoxin
6751.requirement: Complete the story chapter Making the Antitoxin.

6752.name: The Nightmare Ends
6752.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Nightmare Ends.

6753.name: Tower Purifier
6753.requirement: Complete events in the Tower of Nightmares to bring an end to its twisted evils.

6755.name: The Nightmare Unveiled
6755.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Nightmare Unveiled.

6757.name: Seeking Scarlet: Twisted Marionette
6757.requirement: Complete the Twisted Marionette group meta-event, accessed from the Eye of the North, after completing the episode "The Tower of Nightmares."

6758.name: Awake and Allied
6758.requirement: Complete the story chapter Awake and Allied.

6759.name: Nightmare Climber
6759.requirement: Reach the top level of the Tower of Nightmares.

6760.name: Investigative Record 2
6760.requirement: Find and listen to hidden logs from the source of the nightmares.

6761.name: Kraitmare Averted
6761.requirement: Defeat the Toxic Oratuss within the time limit.

6762.name: Tower of Treasures
6762.requirement: Find hidden chests in the Tower of Nightmares.

6763.name: Toxic Krait Transcriber
6763.requirement: Speak with Priory Arcanist Dolja at Thunder Ridge camp during Season 1 Episode 4 to receive an obelisk transcriber.

6764.name: Environmental Protection
6764.requirement: Complete events in Kessex Hills to clean up the devastated area.

6768.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Thirty-Four
6768.requirement: Play ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Four.

6774.name: Dokkaebi Weapon Collection
6774.requirement: Unlock all Dokkaebi weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6775.name: Trick-or-Treat across Tyria
6775.requirement: Participate in Mad King Says or defeat any champion enemies across Tyria.

6776.name: Someone in Need
6776.requirement: Help Zinnia track down the thief and free her from her bindings.

6777.name: Six More Minutes to Knightfall
6777.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
6777.requirement: Defeat all three assault knights within six minutes after the event starts.

6779.name: Seeking Scarlet: Thaumanova Reactor
6779.requirement: Complete the Thaumanova Reactor fractal after completing the episode "The Tower of Nightmares."

6780.name: Against the Alliance 2
6780.requirement: Stabilize Diessa Plateau against the Molten Alliance by completing events and returning audio logs to Agent Brandubh. Molten Alliance events award extra progress.

6781.name: The Battle for Lion's Arch
6781.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Battle for Lion's Arch.

6782.name: Battle on the Breachmaker
6782.requirement: Complete the story chapter Battle on the Breachmaker.

6783.name: After the Battle
6783.requirement: Complete the story chapter After the Battle.

6784.name: Battle for Lion's Arch Mastery
6784.requirement: Complete Battle for Lion's Arch achievements.

6785.name: Connecting the Pieces
6785.requirement: Complete the story chapter Connecting the Pieces.

6786.name: Scarlet's End
6786.requirement: Complete the story chapter Scarlet's End.

6787.name: Speed over Size
6787.requirement: Complete one of the Twisted Marionette's platform encounters without being hit by the marionette's attacks.

6789.name: I've Lived Things
6789.requirement: Hear Taimi's summary of Scarlet's War during the episode "The Battle for Lion's Arch."

6791.name: The People's Champion
6791.requirement: Defeat champion enemies in the public Battle for Lion's Arch mission.

6792.name: All Bets Are Still Off
6792.description: Story Instance: Escape from Lion's Arch
6792.requirement: Find all 7 of Tigg's lost racing moas and rally them to escape Lion's Arch.

6793.name: Dawn of the Next Journey
6793.requirement: Complete the story chapter Dawn of the Next Journey.

6794.name: Please Follow Me to the Exit Again
6794.description: Story Instance: Escape from Lion's Arch
6794.requirement: Find and rescue all 6 hidden evacuees.

6795.name: Assault Breaker
6795.requirement: Participate in defeating the assault knight trio during the Battle for Lion's Arch.

6796.name: Seeking Scarlet: Assault Knight Prototypes
6796.requirement: Complete the Assault Knight Prototypes Strike Mission, which can be accessed from Lion's Arch after completing the episode "The Battle for Lion's Arch."

6797.name: Old Lion's Court
6797.requirement: Complete the Old Lion's Court Strike Mission.

6798.name: Aether Aversion
6798.requirement: Defeat the Triumvirate without dying or taking any damage from Boiling Aether.

6799.name: Investigative Record 3
6799.requirement: Find and listen to hidden logs from the source of the madness.

6800.name: Lions Rampant
6800.requirement: Complete events during the Battle for Lion's Arch.

6801.name: Lions Rampant 2
6801.requirement: Complete events during the Battle for Lion's Arch.

6802.name: Raiders of the Lost Parts II
6802.requirement: Find and retrieve Taimi's golem parts from the Edge of the Mists.

6805.name: The Twisted Marionette
6805.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Twisted Marionette.

6808.name: Escape from Lion's Arch
6808.requirement: Complete the story chapter Escape from Lion's Arch.

6809.name: Guarding the Fields 2
6809.requirement: Complete events in Gendarran Fields to safeguard settlements in the area.

6810.name: Patrolling the Bloodtide Beat 2
6810.requirement: Complete events in Bloodtide Coast to discourage unapproved piracy in the region.

6812.name: Investigative Study 5
6812.requirement: Find and read sources of information on Scarlet's scheme and its fallout during the episode "The Battle for Lion's Arch."
